constantly. Boil 1 minute and remove from heat. When cool, add
vanilla. Sprinkle icing over cooled brownie base and sprinkle with
chocolate chips.

Skin and bone chicken breasts. On hard surface, with meat mallet or
similar flattening utensil, pound chicken to 1/4 in thickness. In
shallow dish, mix together cornstarch, cumin and garlic salt. Add
chicken on piece at a time, dredging to coat. In a small bowl, mix
egg and water. Place cornmeal in another bowl. Dip chicken, first in
egg and then in cornmeal turning to coat. In large frying pan, place
oil and heat to medium temp.; add chicken and cook 2 minutes on each
side. Remove chicken to shallow baking pan; place avocado slices over
chicken and sprinkle with cheese. Bake in 350F oven about 15 minutes
or until fork can be inserted in chicken with ease and cheese melts.
Top chicken with sour cream, dividing equally; sprinkle with chopped
green onion and red pepper.

name: Waldorf Red Velvet Cake and Frosting
author: Unknown

instructions.content:
CAKE:  Cream shortening and sugar till fluffy.  Add eggs and beat 1
minute. Add salt, beat.  Add vanilla and coloring to buttermilk.
Alternate adding flour and milk mixtures to batter. Combine soda and
vinegar in cup and add to cake batter.  Bake in (2) 9" cake pans at
350F for 25 to 30 minutes. Cool on cake racks.

FROSTING: Cook milk and flour until thick; cool in fridge. Beat
butter, sugar and vanilla with mixer. Add flour and milk mixture a
little at a time (make ahead of cake so that it has plenty of time to
cool). Beat well.

Rinse Currents in hot water, drain and dry on a towel.

Cream butter until fluffy, add sugar and spice and cream thoroughly.
Beat egg yolks until thick and creamy; add to butter mixture and
blend well. Add one half of the flour and mix until smooth; add
remainder of flour and mix until smooth again.  Mix in stiffly beaten
egg whites. Pour into 2 paper lined loaf pans (9"x4"x2.5") and bake
at 350F for 1 hour and 25 minutes.

Test for doneness by inserting a toothpick in center.

Prepare tomato sauce; keep warm.

Cut as small a slit as possible in one side of each chile to remove
seeds. Leave stems on. Pat chiles dry with paper towels.

Cut cheese into long thin sticks, one for each chile. Place one stick
in each chile, using more if chiles are large. If chiles are loose
and open, wrap around cheese and fasten with wooden picks.

Pour oil 1/4" deep into large skillet. Heat oil to 365 F. Beat egg
whites in a medium bowl until stiff. Beat egg yolks lightly in a
small bowl and add all at once to beaten egg whites. Fold lightly but
thoroughly. Roll chiles in flour, then dip in egg mixture to coat.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown, turning with a spatula. Drain on
paper towels. Serve immediately topped with tomato sauce.

Tomato Sauce: Combine tomatoes, onion and garlic in blender or food
pro- cessor; puree. Heat oil in a medium saucepan, add tomato
mixture. Cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add broth, salt,
chiles, cloves and cinnamon. Simmer gently 15 minutes.

Put dry yeast in inner pot. Add all remaining ingredients except
water. Carefully pour in lukewarm water. Press the Select button for
white bread. Press the Start button. (When using the preset timer,
refer to the instruction manual.) After taking out the baked bread
from the auto bakery, slice it as desired.

Preheat oven to 375F.

Spray an 8"x8" pan with non-stick cooking spray. Into prepared baking
pan, place all filling ingredients. Toss until well mixed; set aside.
To prepare tamale topping, in medium bowl, place flour, cornmeal,
baking powder, baking soda, and salt; stir until evenly mixed. In a
small bowl, beat yogurt, egg and margarine. Add to dry ingredients
and stir just until dry ingredients are moistened. Spoon mixture
evenly on top of vegatable filling. If desired, sprinkle evenly with
chives. Bake 35-40 minutes, until filling is hot and bubbly, topping
is lightly browned and a toothpick inserted in center of topping
comes clean.

Place chicken in 12 X 8 X 2 inch baking dish and drizzle butter over
it. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.  Cook broccoli, with salt and
water. Drain and place around chicken.  Blend soup, milk and cheese.
Pour over chicken and broccoli.  Top with bread crumbs and sprinkle
with paprika. Bake 20 minutes longer.

name: Cocquel St. Jocque
author: poached fish fillets in shrimp sauce

instructions.content:
Peel and devein shrimp.  Melt butter in top of double boiler.  Stir in
flour; gradually add cream.  Cook over hot water, stirring frequently,
until sauce is thickened.  Add paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, 1/4 teaspoon
pepper, mushrooms, and shrimp.  Let simmer in top of double boiler
while preparing fish.  Split fillets down centers.  Begin at larger
end of fillet; roll up.  Fasten each with toothpick; place in large
skillet.  Add milk, water, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon white
pepper.  Cover fish tightly; simmer gently 10 minutes.  Remove fish
to hot platter; remove toothpicks.  Cover fish with Shrimp Sauce;
garnish with parsley before serving.

Cream together butter, sugar and brown sugar.  Add eggs and vanilla.
Mix together flour, oatmeal (made into flour), salt, baking powder,
and baking soda.  Mix all ingredients.  Add chocolate chips, grated
Hershey bar and nuts.  Put golf ball size dough on ungreased cookie
sheet 2 inches apart. Bake at 375 for 6 minutes.

In bowl, combine all ingredients except cheese and parsley.  Transfer
to microwavable dish; sprinkle with cheese.  Microwave on high 1
minute, or until heated through and cheese is melted.  Garnish with
parsley. Each serving provides: 2 1/2 P, 1 1/2 V, 1B (1 1/2 cup
uncooked rice = 3 cup of cooked rice)

Pull stems out of strawberries and mash strawberries in bowl.  Add
sugar and stir.  Top flan cake with strawberry mixture and cool whip

First Layer:
Cream all together and put in 9X12" pan - bake at 350 degrees for 15
to 20 minutes. Cool.

Second Layer:
Blend and spread on first layer crust.

Third Layer:
Mix instant pudding and milk.  Beat until stiff.  Spread on above
layer

Fourth Layer:
Use rest of Coop Whip then sprinkle with toated pecans or shredded
Hershey bar (optional).  Place in refrigerator until ready to serve.

Prepare cake mix as directed on package.  Pour 1/2 of batter into
greased 9 X 13 inch pan.  Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, melt caramels, margarine and milk together on a double
boiler.

Remove cake from oven and pour caramel mixture over it.  Top with
chocolate chips and pecans.  Dot remaining cake batter over the top
and return cake to oven at 250 degrees for 20 minutes, then turn to
350 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes.

Mix all ingrediants using a little vinegar to rinse out ketchup
bottle to get all ketchup out.

Now let this concoction simmer over low heat for 15 to 20 minutes --
you will know its done when everyone is suddenly in the kitchen.
Pour a little on the beef and watch it disappear.

Barbacue Beef:
Three or four pounds of chuck roast, salt and rub with two
tablespoons of brown sugar.  Add a little water, cook -- cool, and
shred.  Serve with barbacue sauce.

Barbacue Brisket:
Buy and trim a BIG brisquet.  Marinate in spicey Italian salad
dressing and Worcestershire sauce for at least twenty-four hours.
Cover with foil and bake at 350 for four to six hours.  Put a coating
of barbacue sauce on the brisquet before the final hour of baking.
Slice and serve with barbacue sauce.
Marinate for 24 hours

Sprinkle cucumbers with 1 t. salt & let stand 10 min.  Press out
excess liquid.  Combine sugar, parsley, sour cream, vinegar, salt &
onion.Pour over cukes and sprinkle paprika over top.

Cut up fruit dippers such as apples, bananas, pineapple chunks, orange
segments, grapes or strawberries.  Combine cr. cheese, marshmallow
cream and lemon juice in bowl.  Mix with wire whisk until well
blended.  Serve with fruit dippers.  Makes 1 cup.

MIX SALAD DRESSING MIX, MAYONAISE AND MILK.  ADD SOFTENED CREAM
CHEESE. BEAT WELL.  ADD CHEDDAR AND BLEND.  COVER AND FREEZE 30 MIN.
SHAPE INTO BALL, ROLL IN ALMONDS.

Line dish or pan with beans.  Mash avacados, chop tomatoes, add lemon
juice, sprinkle of garlic powder.  Mix together and spread on top of
beans. Mix sour cream  mayonaise and taco seasoning and spread over
avacado. Cover with cheese.  Sprinkle finely chopped green onions
over cheese.  Add sliced olives and pimento.  Serve with chips.

Seft flour, salt and spices; set aside.  Cream sugar, eggs and oil,
beat the buttermilk and soda  and add to cream mixture.  Gradually
add dry ingredients.  Add vanilla, coconut and pecans.  Mix and bake
in greased and floured tube pan at 350 for 1 hr.  FROSTING:  3 oz.
cream cheese, 1/4 stick oleo, 1/2 box powdered sugar, 1/2 c chopped
pecans, 1/2 c coconut, 1 t. vanilla.  Mix all together.  Add 1 t.
milk if desired for spreading consistency.

Soak bread cubes in milk.  Add beaten eggs, sugar & salt.  Sprlinkle
top with nutmeg.  Place pudding pan in hot water and bake in 350 oven
till firm and top is browned.  Cheryl says her mother just mixes
bread pieces with sugar, eggs, milk, vanilla and melted oleo.  For a
change she adds raisins or fruit.

MIX WATER, OIL, PUDDING AND CAKE MIX ON LOW SPEED TILL BLENDED.  BEAT
ON HIGH 2 MIN.   ADD EXTRACT AND A FEW DROPS OF GREEN FOOD COLOR; MIX
TILL BLENDED.  RESERVE 2  C. OF BATTER, POUR REST OF INTO GREASED AND
FLOURED BUNDT PAN.  ADD 1 C OF FROSTING TO REST OF BATTER & BLEND.
SPOON OVER BATTER IN PAN AND SWIRL WITH KNIFE.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 50-60
MIN.  COOL. PUT REMAINING FROSTING IN SAUCE PAN  AND SOFTEN OVER LOW
HEAT.  DRIZZLE OVER COOL CAKE.

MIX CRISCO AND SUGAR.  ADD ONE EGG AT A TIME.  ADD FLOUR AND VANILLA
AND MIX WELL.  BAKE IN GREASED AND FLOURED BUNDT PAN AT 350 FOR 1 HR.
ICING: 1 BOX POWDERED SUGAR 1 STICK OLEO AND JUICE FROM PINEAPPLE.
POUR OVER CAKE WHILE STILL WARM.

MIX CAKE MIX, JELLO, SOUR CREAM WATER AND OIL.  BREAK UP WAFERS AND
FOLD IN.  BAKE IN GREASED AND FLOURED BUNDT PAN ACCORDING TO PKG.
DIRECTIONS. FROSTING:  1 C. POWDERED SUGAR, 9 OZ. COOL WHIP AND GREEN
FOOD COLOR.

BAKE ANGEL FOOD CAKE MIX ACCORDING TO PKG. DIRECTIONS.  COOL.  MIX
JELLO WITH HOT WATER AND LET JELL SLIGHTLY.  FOLD IN COOL WHIP.
FROST CAKE.

Cream brown sugar and oleo together.  Add eggs and vanilla.  Mix
well. Mix raisins and dates with a little of the flour.  Add rest of
flour and mix well.  Dissolve soda in 2 T of cherry juice.  Add to
batter.  Add fruit and nuts and stir to blend.  Drop on greased
cookie sheet.  Bake at 350 about 10 min.

Cream sugar and crisco well.  Add beaten egg, milk and vanilla.  Add
sifted dry ingredients.  Roll out thin and cut in circles.  Put
filling on one circle cover with another.  Press the edges together.
Bake at 350 for 15 min. FILLING: Mix dates, sugar and water and cook
till soft and thick. Add nuts.

Bub brisket with generous sprinkling of Mr. Meat Smoker Seasoning.
Let stand at room temperature for 1-2 hours.  Pour 1 qt. barbecue
sauce into water pan; then add water.  Smoke-cook 7-9 HRS.

SPRINKLE FRESH HAM GENEROUSLY WITH MR. MEAT SMOKER SEASONING AND RUB
IT IN. LET STAND AT ROOM TEMPERATURE FOR 1 HR.  POUR APPLE JUICE INTO
WATER PAN AND ADD WATER.  SMOKE-COOK 7-9 HOURS.

Combine ingredients, pour over meat.  Bake covered at 250 for 6 hrs.
slice thinly and serve on buns.  You can cook in a slow cooker for
8-10 hrs.if you prefer.

Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.  Cook in boiliing salted water till
tender (about 15-20 min.)   Drain;  mash eggplant with a fork.  Brown
meat in 3 T oleo.  Add onion and green pepper;  cook till tender.
Stir in mashed egg plant and rice.  Spoon into 9x12 dish  Saute bread
crumbs in 2 T oleo.  Sprinkle over eggplant mixture.  Bake at 375
about 20 min.

Saute meat, onion and pepper, drain. Add everything but cheese.
Simmer 50 min.  Pour into greased casserole dish.  Top with grated
cheese.  Bake at 325 for 30 min. or till cheese is melted.

In mixing bowl stir together flour, pudding mix, and baking powder.
Combine egg, milk and oleo and add to dry ingredients.  Mix well and
spread in a greased 8x8x2 baking dish.  Drain peaches, sprinkle on
top of batter. Beat cr. cheese, 1/2 c sugar and reserved peach juice;
pour over peaches. combine 1 T sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over
all.  Bake at 350 for 45 min.

Mix flour, sugar and salt and cut in shortening.  Add milk to beaten
egg yolk and add to flour mixture.  Divide dough in half and roll out
for jelly roll pan.  Sprinkle with crushed corn flake crumbs.  Mix
apples and 1 c sugar and cinnamon, spread on corn flakes.  Add top
crust.  Beat egg white till frothy and brush on top of crust.  Bake
at 450 for 10 min at 350 for 50 min.  Frost with 1 c powdered sugar
and lemon juice while still warm.

Bake cake mix according to package directions.  Cool slightly then
poke little holes in the top of the cake with a pencil and dribble in
the Eagle brand milk and caramel sauce and let it stand for an hour.
After that, cover the entire cake with whipped cream and sprinkle
with Heath candy bars.  Refrigerate.

In large bowl combine squash, onion, carrot and soup.  Mix sour cream
and flour.  Stir into vegetables.  Toss stuffing crumbs with oleo and
put half in crock pot.  Add vegetables and top with remaining
stuffing crumbs. Cover and cook on low 7-9 hrs.

Wash and core apples (do not peel).  In a saucepan combine sugar,
water and oleo.  Heat stirring till sugar is dissoled.  For filling,
thoroughly combine nuts, brown sugar, cinnamon and egg.  Spoon
filling into apples until 2/3 full.  Pour syrup over filling untill
cavity is filled.  Place apples on rack in crock pot.  Add 1/2 c.
water.  Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hrs.  Serve warm.

In a sauce pan cook egg plant in enough boiling water to cover until
tender.  About 7-9 min.  Drain well.  Mex eggplant with rest of
ingredients except cheese.  Pour into greased crock pot.  Sprinkle
with cheese. Cover & cook on low 4-8 hrs.

MELT CARAMELS IN DOUBLE BOILER WITH WATER.  PUT PECANS IN AND MIX
TOGETHER. BUTTER COOKIE SHEETS AND DROP MIXTURE BY TEASPOON.  CHILL
TILL COLD. WHILE IT IS GETTING COLD, MELT CHOCOLATE CHIPS IN A DOUBLE
BOILER. DIP CANDY IN CHOCOLATE WITH FORK THEN PUT ON WAX PAPER TO DRY.

BOIL INGREDIENTS TO SOFT BALL STAGE.  FOLD IN PEANUT BUTTER AND
MARSHMALLOW CREAM, VANILLA AND BUTTER.  BEAT TILL CREAMY.  POUR INTO
BUTTERED DISH TO HARDEN.

BROWN SAUSAGE, DRAIN.  REMOVE FROM SKILLET.   COOK GROUND BEEF, GREEN
PEPPER, ONION AND GARLIC.  ADD TOMATOES, SALT, PEPPER AND SAUSAGE.
COVER AND SIMMER 20 MIN.  ADD RICE AND WATER.  COVER AND SIMMER 25
MIN. MORE OR TILL RICE IS DONE.

CREAM PEANUT BUTTER AND OLEO TOGETHER.  ADD POWDERED SUGAR AND CRUMBS
AND MIX WELL.  SPREAD MIXTURE INTO A 9X12 DISH.  MELT CHOCOLATE CHIPS
AND SPREAD OVER  TOP.  SERVE AFTER CHOCOLATE MIXTURE HAS COMPLETELY
COOLED. APPROXIMATELY 4 HOURS.

BLEND CREAM CHEESE, ONION, HORSERADISH AND WORCESTERSHIRE SAUCE UNTIL
OF SPREADING CONSISTENCY.  SEPARATE MEAT SLICES.  LAY OUT 5 SLICES,
SLIGHTLY OVERLAPPING ON AN 18 IN. PIECE OF ALUMINUM FOIL.  LAY OUT
TWO MORE ROWS TO FORM A RECTANGLE OF MEAT.  SPREAD WITH CHEESE
MIXTURE.  ROLL UP LIKE A JELLY ROLL USING FOIL TO BRING UP MEAT AT
BEGINING OF ROLL.  USE FINGERS TO ROLL UNTIL COMPLETE.  CHILL.  JUST
BEFORE SERVING, SLICE INTO ONE INCH SLICES.

HEAT OVEN TO 375.  BEAT SUGARS AND SHORTENING IN LARGE BOWL UNTIL
LIGHT AND FLUFFY.  BLEND IN EGGS AND VANILLA.  ADD COMBINED FLOUR,
BAKING SODA AND SALT.  MIX WELL.  STIR IN 1/2 C. CANDY.  DROP DOUGH
BY ROUNDED TEASPOONFULS ONTO UNGREASED COOKIE SHEET.  PRESS 2 OR 3
ADDITIONAL CANDIES IN EACH COOKIE.  BAKE 10 TO 12 MIN.

HEAT OVEN TO 350.  GREASE RECTANGULAR PAN 13X9.  HEAT CHOCOLATE AND
SHORTENING IN 3 QT. SAUCEPAN OVER LOW HEAT UNTIL MELTED.  REMOVE FROM
HEAT; MIX IN SUGAR, VANILLA AND EGGS.  STIR IN REMAINING INGREDIENTS
EXCEPT CANDIES.  SPREAD IN PAN.  SPRINKLE WITH CANDIES.  PRESS
LIGHTLY. BAKE UNTIL BROWNIES BEGIN TO PULL AWAY FROM SIDES OF PAN,
ABOUT 30 MIN. DO NOT OVERBAKE.  COOL COMPLETELY;  CUT INTO BARS.

SIFT DRY INGREDIENTS TOGETHER.  IN LARGE MIXING BOWL, BEAT TOGETHER
OLEO,PEANUT BUTTER AND SUGAR TILL THOROUGHLY COMBINED.  ADD EGGS AND
VANILLA.  BEAT WELL.  STIR IN DRY INGREDIENTS.  ADD NUT & HONEY
FLAKES AND PEANUT BUTTER CHIPS.  DROP BY TEASPOON ONTO UNGREASED
BAKING SHEET, FLATTEN WITH FORK. BAKE AT 350 FOR 12 MIN.

IN 2 QT. SAUCEPAN, COMBINE DATES, 0RANGE JUICE, THE 1/4C SUGAR AND
CLOVES. COOK, OVER MED. HEAT, STIRRING OCCASIONALLY, TILL MIXTURE
BEGINS TO BOIL. REDUCE HEAT AND SIMMER 5 MIN. OR TILL MIXTURE IS VERY
THICK.  STIRRING OCCASIONALLY.  SET ASIDE TO COOL.  COMBINE FLOUR,
THE REMAINING 1/4 C SUGAR, NUT & HONEY AND CINNAMON.  USING PASTRY
BLENDER CUT IN OLEO UNTIL MIXTURE RESEMBLES COARSE CRUMBS.  ADD KARO
MIXING TILL THOROUGHLY COMBINED. PAT HALF OF CEREAL MIXTURE IN BOTTOM
OF GREASED 9X9 PAN. SPREAD DATE FILLING OVER CRUST.  PAT REMAINING
CEREAL MIXTURE OVER DATE FILLING. PRESSING SLIGHTLY.  BAKE AT 375
ABOUT 35 MIN..  CUT INTO BARS. SERVE WARM OR COLD WITH COOL WHIP IF
DESIRED.

MICROWAVE OLEO AND 2 OZ OF CHOCOLATE ON HIGH 1 OR 2 MIN. TILL MELTED
WHEN STIRRED, STIRRING EVERY 30 SECONDS.  STIR IN CRUMBS, COCONUT AND
PEANUTS. PRESS ONTO BOTTOM 13X9 DISH.  CHILL 30 MIN.  MIX CREAM
CHEESE, SUGAR AND VANILLA TILL WELL BLENDED.  SPREAD OVER CRUST;
CHILL 30 MIN.  MICROWAVE REMAINING OLEO AND CHOCOLATE ON HIGH 1 OR 2
MIN. OR TILL MELTED WHEN STIRRED, STIRRING EVERY 30 SECONDS.  SPREAD
OVER CREAM CHEESE LAYER. CHILL, CUT INTO SQUARES.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 375.  COMBINE DRY INGREDIENTS AND SET ASIDE.  BEAT
BROWN SUGAR, OLEO AND VANILLA TILL CREAMY.  ADD EGG, BEAT WELL.
GRADUALLY ADD FLOUR MIXTURE.  STIR IN 1 1/3 C CHOCOLATE CHIPS AND
NUTS.  SPREAD INTO FOIL-LINED 9"SQUARE PAN.  BAKE AT 375 FOR 25-30
MIN. IMMEDIATELY SPRINKLE 2/3 C. CHOCOLATE CHIPS OVER TOP.  SPREAD
EVENLY WHEN COOL. CHILL 5-10 MIN TO SET CHOCOLATE.

list.name: MELTED OLEO COOLED TO ROOM T

instructions.content:
PREHEAT OVEN TO 325.  IN LARGE BOWL, BEAT EGGS TILL FOAMY.  ADD FLOUR,
SUGAR AND BROWN SUGAR;  BEAT WELL.  BLEND IN OLEO.  STIR IN CHOCOLATE
CHIPS AND NUTS.  POUR INTO PIE SHELL.  BAKE AT 325 FOR 1 HOUR.  SERVE
WARM WITH WHIPPED CREAM OR ICE CREAM, IF DESIRED.  RECIPE MAY BE
DOUBLED FOR 2 PIES. THEY MAY BE FROZEN FOR LATER USE.  IF USING A
FROZEN PIE SHELL, USE ONLY DEEP DISH STYLE AND THAW COMPLETELY.
PLACE ON COOKIE SHEET, BAKE 10 MIN. LONGER.  (No nuts for Rachel &
David)

HEAT OVEN TO 350.  GREASE 8" SQUARE PAN.  IN MEDIUM MIXING BOWL BLEND
MELTED OLEO, SUGAR AND VANILLA.  ADD EGGS;  BEAT WELL WITH SPOON.
COMBINE FLOUR,COCOA, BAKING POWDER AND SALT;  GRADUALLY ADD TO EGG
MIXTURE, BEATING TILL WELL BLENDED.  STIR IN CHIPS.  SPREAD INTO PAN.
BAKE 40-45 MIN. OR TILL BROWNIES BEGIN TO PULL AWAY FROM SIDES OF
PAN.  COOL COMPLETELY.

COMBINE SUGAR, OEO AND MILK IN HEAVY SAUCEPAN AND BRING TO A FULL BOIL
STIRRING CONSTANTLY. CONTINUE BOILING 5 MIN.OVER MED. HEAT TILL
THERMOMETER REACHES 234, STIRRING CONSTANTLY.  REMOVE FROM HEAT.  ADD
CHOCOLATE CHIPS AND STIR TILL MELTED.  ADD CREAM, PEANUT BUTTER AND
VANILLA. BEAT TILL WELL BLENDED.  POUR INTO 2 QT. GREASED BOWL; COVER
WITH WAXED PAPER. COOL TO ROOM TEMPERATURE.  DIVIDE ITO THIRDS.
SHAPE EACH THIRD INTO A 10" LOG. ROLL 2 LOGS IN CHOPPED NUTS AND THE
THIRD LOG IN COCONUT. CHILL AND CUT INTO SLICES.

MIX BUTTERMILK, PUDDING MIX AND VANILLA TILL THICK.  CUT PEACHES INTO
SMALL PIECES.  ADD TO PUDDING.  FOLD IN COOKIE CRUMBS AND COOL WHIP.

BROWN GR MEAT, ONION, GREEN PEPPER, CELERY LEAVES.  ADD TOMATO PASTE,
WATER AND SEASONINGS.  COOK NO MORE THAN 2 HOURS.  IF SAUCE HAS NO
FLAVOR IN 1 1/2 HOURS ADD A TINY BIT OF EACH SEASONING MORE.  ADD 1/4
T. OF ACCENT 20 MIN BEFORE DONE.  ADD MUSHROOMS AND BUTTER TO
SPAGHETTI.
MIX ALL INGREDIENTS.  BAKE AT 350 TILL CABBAGE IS DONE.

WITH A WOODEN SPOON MIX THAWED ICE CREAM, PEANUT BUTTER, PEANUTS AND
CHOCOLATE CHIPS.  SPOON INTO CRUST.  COVER AND FREEZE 2 HOURS.  POUR
MELTED CHOCOLATE TOPPING OVER TOP.  RETURN TO FREEZER FOR 30 MIN.
BORDER IT WITH COLD HOT FUDGE.

MIX FLOUR, BROWN SUGAR, OLEO AND PECANS TILL CRUMBLY.  PRESS 2 3/4 C
MIXTURE IN 9X13 PAN.  ADD TO REMAINING MIXTURE REST OF INGREDIENTS.
SPOON ON TOP.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 25-30 MIN.

CREAM OLEO AND SUGAR TILL LIGHT & FLUFFY.  ADD EGGS ONE AT A TIME
BEATING WELL AFTER EACH ADDITION.  STIR IN VANILLA.  COMBINE FLOUR,
SODA AND SPICES ADD TO CREAMED MIXTURE, MIXING WELL AFTER EACH
ADDITION.  STIR IN FIGS, NUTS, COCONUT AND RAISINS.  SPOON BATTER
INTO A GREASED & FLOURED 10" TUBE PAN OR BUNDT PAN.  BAKE AT 350 FOR
50 MIN OR TILL DONE.

MIX DRY INGREDIENTS, ADD MILK & COOK TILL THICK, ADD EGGS & COOK UNTIL
THICK.  ADD BUTTER & VANILLA.  COOL.  SPRINKLE GRAHAM CRACKER CRUST
WITH CINNAMON.  PUT PUDDING IN PIE SHELL WHEN COOL.  SPREAD WITH COOL
WHIP TO SERVE.

MIX FIRST 5 ITEMS.  BAKE AT 350 FOR ABOUT 30-35 MIN.  SPREAD CHEESE
ON TOP AND RETURN TO OVEN TILL CHEESE IS MELTED.  YOU MAY ADD CHOPPED
JALAPENO IF DESIRED.

HEAT OVEN TO 350.  GREASE AND FLOUR 15X10X1 PAN.  IN LARGE BOWL
COMBINE FIRST FOUR INGREDIENTS.  STIR BY HAND TILL WELL MIXED.  POUR
INTO PREPARED PAN.  BAKE 20X30 MIN.  OR TILL TOOTHPICK COMES OUT
CLEAN.  IN SMALL SAUCEPAN COMBINE SUGAR, OLEO & MILK.  BOIL STIRRING
CONSTANTLY FOR 1 MIN. REMOVE FROM HEAT AND ADD CHIPS AND NUTS.  STIR
TILL SMOOTH.  POUR OVER WARM BARS.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  GREASE 2 LOAF PANS.  LINE BOTTOMS WITH WAXED
PAPER AND GREASE PAPER.  COMBINE CAKE MIX AND FLOUR IN LARGE MIXER
BOWL.  ADD WATER, EGGS AND OIL.  BLEND THEN BEAT 2 MIN.  AT MED.
SPEED.  STIR IN PECANS, CHOCOLATE CHIPS AND CHERRIES.  DIVIDE BATTER
EVENLY IN PANS.  BAKE 55-60 MIN.  CAKE IS DONE FI TOOTH PICK COMES
OUT CLEAN.  COOL IN PANS 15 MIN.  REMOVE FROM PANS.  COOL COMPLETELY
BEFORE SLICING.

MIX SALAD DRESING, SOUR CREAM, CUCUMBERS, ONIONS AND CHOPPED EGG
WHITES. CHILL.  FOR EACH SERVING, TOP GREENS WITH TUNA AND DRESSING.
GARNISH WITH SEIVED EGG YOLK AND TOMATOES.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 325.  IN LARGE BOWL, BEAT EGG WITH SWEET N LOW.  MELT
OLEO IN BOILING WATER.  ADD TO EGG MIXTURE.  STIR IN MOLASSES.  SIFT
DRY INGREDIENTS TOGETHER; ADD TO EGG MIXTURE AND BEAT TILL SMOOTH.
POUR INTO NON STICK 9" SQUARE PAN.  BAKE 40 MIN OR TILL TOOTHPICK
COMES OUT CLEAN. 2X3" PIECE=165 CALORIES  PROTIEN 3 GM  CARBOHYDRATE
33 GM  FAT 3 GM SODIUM 170 MG

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  SPRAY 8" SQUARE PAN WITH PAM.  MIX ALL
INGREIENTS TOGETHER.  BAKE 30 MIN OR UNTIL TOOTHPICK COMES OUT CLEAN.
60 CALORIES EACH SERVING.  TRACE FAT

IN A MEDIUM BOWL, COMBINE ALL INGREDIENTS EXCEPT NUTS AND RADISHES.
CHILL TILL SLIGHTLY FIRM.  FORM INTO DESIRED SHAPE.  AND GARNISH WITH
NUTS, RADISH SLICES AND PECAN HALVES.  CHILL SEVERAL HOURS OR
OVERNIGHT.  SERVE WITH CRACKERS.  YEILDS APPROXIMATELY 3 1/2 C CHEESE
MIXTURE.

MIX ALTOGETHER AND FREEEZE IN MUFFIN TINS OR PRINGLE CANS AND SLICE TO
SERVE.

BLEND SALAD DRESSING, SOUR CREAM, SALT AND LEMON JUICE.  COMBINE WITH
REMAINING INGREDIENTS.  SERVE WARM OR COLD.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 375.  IN SMALL BOWL COMBINE  OLEO, SUGAR AND NUTS.
MIX TILL CRUMBLY.  SPOON INTO WELL GREASED AND FLOURED BUNDT PAN.
CHILL WHILE YOU PREPARE CAKE BATTER.  IN SMALL BOWL COMBINE FLOUR,
BAKING SODA AND SALT.  SET ASIDE.  PLACE VINEGAR IN 1 C. LIQUID
MEASURE FILL WITH MILK TO 1 C. LINE.  SET ASIDE.  IN LARGE MIXING
BOWL COMBINE OLEO, BROWN SUGAR AND VANILLA.  BEAT AT MED. SPEED UNTIL
LIGHT AND FLUFFY.  ABOUT 3-5 MIN.  ADD EGGS ONE AT A TIME BEATING
WELL AFTER EACH ADDITION.  ADD FLOUR MIXTURE AND MILK ALTERNATELY.
FOLD IN CHOCOLATE CHIPS.  POUR INTO PREPARED PAN. BAKE AT 375 FOR 50
MIN.  LOOSEN EDGES OF CAKE WITH A SPATULA.  IMMEDIATELY INVERT ON
COOLING RACK.

IN LARGE BOWL WITH MIXER AT MED. SPEED BEAT PEANUT BUTTER, SUGAR,
KARO, OLEO, EGGS AND VANILLA TILL SMOOTH.  REDUCE SPEED; BEAT IN
FLOUR, BAKING POWDER AND SALT TILL WELL BLENDED.  STIR IN 1 1/2 C
CHOCOLATE CHIPS. SPREAD EVENLY IN UNGREASED 15X10 PAN BAKE AT 350 FOR
25 MIN. OR TILL LIGHTLY BROWNED.  COOL.  MELT REMAINING 1/2 C
CHOCOLATE CHIPS; DRIZZLE OVER SURFACE.  CUT INTO BARS.

MIX APPLES, LEMON JUICE, SUGAR AND CINNAMON.  PLACE IN BOTTOM OF PAN.
MIX OATMEAL, FLOUR, BROWN SUGAR AND OIL.  POUR OVER THE FIRST
MIXTURE.  BAKE AT 375 FOR 30 MIN. OR TILL BROWN.

COMBINE ALL INGREDIENTS IN BLENDER AND WHIRL TILL SMOOTH.  1/4 C =35
CAL.

SPRAY PAN WITH PAM.  IN LARGE BOWL, COMBINE CEREAL AND MILK.  SET
ASIDE. IN ANOTHER BOWL, COMBINE EGG, APPLESAUCE AND MELTED OLEO.
STIR INTO CEREAL MIXTURE. ADD DRY INGREDIENTS, STIRRING TILL BLENDED.
YOU MAY USE MUFFIN PAPERS IF DESIRED.  FILL 3/4 FULL.  BAKE AT 400
FOR 15 MIN. OR TILL DONE. 1/2 C. RAISINS OR CHOPPED APPLE MAY BE
ADDED TO THE MIXTURE IF DESIRED. 1 MUFFIN IS 117 CALORIES  23 MG.
CHOLESTEROL  2.5 G FAT

PREPARE GELATIN AS DIRECTED USING 1 1/2 C WATER.  ADD REMAINING
INGREDIENTS AND MIX THOROUGHLY.  SPOON INTO 10 IN. RING MOLD AND
REFRIGERATE TILL FIRM. UNMOLD ON COLD PLATTER AND SURROUND WITH SALAD
GREENS.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  COMBINE FLOUR, SUGAR AND COCOA.  CUT IN OLEO
TILL CRUMBLY.  PRESS INTO BOTTOM OF 9X12 DISH.  BAKE 15 MIN.  IN
SAUCE PAN OVER MED. HEAT, MELT 1 C. CHOCOLATE CHIPS, EAGLE BRAND AND
VANILLA.  POUR OVER CRUST.  TOP WITH NUTS AND REMAINING CHOCOLATE
CHIPS.  PRESS DOWN FIRMLY. BAKE 20 MIN. OR TILL SET.

PREPARE PIE FILLING MIX WITH 2 1/4 C MILK AS DIRECTED ON PKG. FOR PIE.
MEASURE 1 CUP FILLING AND SET ASIDE.  POUR A THIN LAYER OF THE
REMAINING FILLING INTO PIE SHELL.  SET ASIDE HALF OF 1 BANANA.  SLICE
1 1/2 BANANAS AND ARRANGE SLICES ON FILLING IN SHELL.  TOP WITH
REMAINING FILLING.  FOLD WHIPPED TOPPING INTO MEASURED FILLING;
SPREAD CAREFULLY OVER FILLING IN SHELL.  CHILL 3 HOURS.  GARNISH WITH
ADDITIONAL WHIPPED TOPPING AND RESERVED BANANA, SLICED.

COMBINE PUDDING MIX, EGG NOG, MILK AND NUTMEG IN A SAUCEPAN.  COOK
AND STIR OVER MEDIUM HEAT TILL MIXTURE COMES TO A FULL BUBBLING BOIL.
REMOVE FROM HEAT; ADD RUM AND COOL 5 MIN., STIRRING TWICE.  POUR INTO
PIE SHELL. COVER SURFACE OF FILLING WITH PLASTIC WRAP.  CHILL AT
LEAST 3 HOURS. GARNISH WITH WHIPPED TOPPING AND GROUND NUTMEG OR
CHOPPED CANDIED FRUITS OR PECANS.

COMBINE PIE FILLING MIX, PUMPKIN, MILK AND SPICES IN BOWL.  MIX
SLOWLY WITH ELECTRIC MIXER OR HAND BEATER JUST TILL BLENDED, ABOUT 1
MIN.  FOLD IN WHIPPED TOPPING.  SPOON INTO PIE CRUST.  FREEZE TILL
FIRM, 4 HOURS OR OVER NIGHT.  LET STAND AT ROOM TEMPERATURE ABOUT 30
MIN. BEFORE CUTTING. GARNISH WITH ADDITIONAL WHIPPED TOPPING.

HEAT COCONUT, PECANS, BROWN SUGAR AND OLEO, STIRRING TO DISSOLVE
SUGAR. SPREAD IN PIE SHELL.  BAKE AT 450 FOR 5 MIN., TILL BUBBLY;
COOL.  IN A SAUCEPAN, COMBINE REMAINING INGREDIENTS EXCEPT WHIPPED
TOPPING.  COOK AS DIRECTED ON THE PUDDING PACKAGE FOR PIE.  COOL 5
MIN, STIRRING OCCASIONALLY.  POUR INTO PIE SHELL. COVER SURFACE WITH
PLASTIC WRAP. CHILL AT LEAST 4 HOURS.  TO SERVE, GARNISH WITH WHIPPED
TOPPING, AND GRATED CHOCOLATE, IF DESIRED.

COMBINE MILK AND EGG IN MEDIUM BOWL.  SET ASIDE.  COMBINE FLOUR,
GARLIC SALT, PAPRIKA, PEPPER AND POULTRY SEASONING IN PAPER OR
PLASTIC BAG.  ADD A FEW PIECES OF CHICKEN AT A TIME.  SHAKE TO COAT.
DIP CHICKEN IN MILK-EGG MIXTURE.  SHAKE SECOND TIME IN FLOUR MIXTURE.
SKILLET OR DEEP FRY IN CRISCO.  TO SKILLET FRY, HEAT 1/2 TO 1 IN.
CRISCO TO 365 IN ELECTRIC OR IN LARGE HEAVY SKILLET ON MEDIUM HIGH
HEAT.  BROWN CHICKEN ON ALL SIDES,. REDUCE HEAT TO 275 OR MEDIUM-LOW
HEAT. CONTINUE COOKING UNTIL CHICKEN IS TENDER, ABOUT 30-40 MIN.  DO
NOT COVER.  TURN CHICKEN SEVERAL TIMES DURING COOKING.  DRAIN ON
PAPER TOWELS.  TO DEEP FRY, HEAT 2 OR 3 INCHES CRISCO TO 365 IN DEEP
FRYER OR DEEP SAUCEPAN.  FRY CHICKEN FOR 15-18 MIN. DRAIN ON PAPER
TOWELS.  FOR EXTRA SPICY CHICKEN INCREASE BLACK PEPPER TO 2 t. AND
POULTRY SEASONING TO 1/2 t.

CUT SAUSAGE INTO 4 PIECES.  SPLIT LENGTHWISE AND STUFF EACH WITH 1/2
SLICE MOZZARELLA CHEESE.  WRAP EACH PIECE IN A COOKED LASAGNA NOODLE.
PLACE IN SMALL BAKING DISH AND COVER WITH SAUCE.  BAKE COVERED AT 350
FOR 30 MIN.

MIX ALL INGREDIENTS TOGETHER DRY AND PLACE IN AN AIRTIGHT CONTAINER.
TO MAKE A CUP, MIX APPROXIMATELY 3 TABLESPOONS TO A COFFEE CUP OF HOT
WATER. TO MAKE A POT OR MORE, MIX 3 SCOOPS TO A COFFEE POT OF HOT
WATER.

BROWN MEAT AND ONION TOGETHER AND DRAIN.  ADD REST OF INGREDIENTS.
SIMMER 1 HOUR STIRRING OFTEN TO KEEP FROM STICKING.

MIX SUGAR WITH SYRUP.  ADD PEANUTS AND STIR WELL.  MICROWAVE ON HIGH
FOR 8-10 MIN.  STIRRING WELL AFTER 4 MIN.  ADD VANILLA AND OLEO AND
MICROWAVE ON HIGH FOR 2 MIN.  STIR WELL AND ADD SODA.  SPREAD
IMMEDIATELY ONTO BUTTERED PAN..COOL COMPLETELY BEFORE BREAKING INTO
PIECES.

COOK BROCCOLI WITH SALT ACCORDING OT DIRECTIONS ON PACKAGEE.  DRAIN.
ADD SOUP, MAYONNAISE AND CHOPPED PECANS.  MIX WELL. ADD EGGS AND
ONION.  POUR INTO GREASED 2 QT. CASSEROLE DISH.  SPRINKLE WITH THE
GRATED CHEESE AND TOP WITH BUTTERED BREAD CRUMBS.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 30
MIN.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  SPRAY A 9" SQUARE PAN WITH PAM.  MIX DRY
INGREDIENTS TILL WELL MIXED.  WHISK EGG WHITES, WATER AND CORN SYRUP.
STIR INTO DRY INGREDIENTS TILL SMOOTH.  POUR INTO PREPARED PAN.  BAKE
30 MIN. OR TILL CAKE SPRINGS BACK WHEN LIGHTLY TOUCHED.  COOL ON WIRE
RACK 10 MIN.

MELT OLEO IN 13X9 DISH IN OVEN AT 250.  REMOVE FROM OVEN.  STIR IN
GARLIC SALT, ONION SALT, LEMON JUICE AND WORCESTERSHIRE SAUCE.  ADD
CRISPIX, NUTS AND PRETZELS, STIRRING TILL COATED.  BAKE AT 250 FOR 45
MIN., STIRRING EVERY 15 MIN. SPREAD ON ABSORBENT PAPER TO COOL.

PAT DOUGH ON LIGHTLY FLOURED BOARD.  CUT INTO STICKS OR SQUARES.
BAKE AT 300 FOR 30 MIN.  ROLL IN SIFTED POWDERED SUGAR WHILE HOT.

CREAM OLEO WITH SUGAR UNTIL FLUFFY, ADD EGGS AND VANILLA.  MIX WELL.
ADD FLOUR.  THE DOUGH WILL BE STIFF.  CHILL 2 OR 3 HOURS.  DROP ON
COOKIE SHEET.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 10 MIN.

COMBINE ABOVE INGREDIENTS.  MIX 1/2 C. BUTTERMILK, 1 t. SODA, 1 T.
VANILLA THEN ADD TO OTHER MIXTURE.  PRESS ON FLOURED SHEET AND CUT
WITH BISCUIT CUTTER.  BAKE AT 35O ABOUT 10 MIN.

MIX ALL CHEESE WITH MAYONNAISE.  ADD REST OF INGREDIENTS AND FORM
INTO A BALL.  ROLL IN PARSLEY.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  IN A LARGE BOWL, STIR COCOA AND OLEO UNTIL
SMOOTH. STIR IN REMAINING INGREDIENTS UNTIL WELL BLENDED.  LET DOUGH
STAND 10 MIN. DROP BY HEAPING TEASPOONFULS ONTO LIGHTLY GREASED
BAKING SHEETS.  BAKE 7-9 MIN. OR TILL SET (DO NOT OVERBAKE).  COOL 5
MIN. REMOVE FROM BAKING SHEETS. COOL COMPLETELY.  STORE TIGHTLY
COVERED.

MIX OLEO, SUGARS, VANILLA, PUDDING MIX AND EGGS, AND THEN ADD FLOUR,
BAKING SODA AND CHIPS.  POUR INTO AN UNGREASED 14 IN. PIZZA PAN AND
BAKE ABOUT 25-30 MIN. AT 350 OR TILL DONE.  DO NOT OVERBAKE.  WHEN
COOKIE IS COOL, REMOVE AND DECORATE IF DESIRED.  CUT INTO SLICES OR
SQUARES AND STORE IN AIRTIGHT CONTAINER.  YOU MAY MAKE 4 DOZ. SMALL
COOKIES INSTEAD, BUT THEY SHOULD BAKE ONLY 8-10 MIN.  I HAVE ALSO
DIDIDED THE DOUGH AFTER MIXING, ADDING CHOCOLATE CHIPS TO HALF AND
PEANUT BUTTER CHIPS TO HALF. THEN YOU PAT THE DIFFERENT DOUGHS INTO
OPPOSITE SIDES OF THE PIZZA PAN.

DISSOLVE YEAST IN WARM WATER IN LARGE BOWL.  STIR IN POTATOES, SUGAR,
SHORTENING, EGGS, SALT AND 3 CUPS FLOUR.  BEAT TILL SMOOTH.  MIX IN
ENOUGH REMAINING FLOUR TO MAKE DOUGH EASY TO HANDLE.  TURN DOUGH ONTO
FLOURED SURFACE AND KNEAD TILL SMOOTH AND ELASTIC (10 MIN).  PLACE IN
GREASED BOWL; TURN GREASED SIDE UP.  COVER BOWL TIGHTLY;  REFRIGERATE
AT LEAST 8 HOURS, BUT NOT LONGER THAN 5 DAYS.  PUNCH DOWN DOUGH AND
MAKE IT INTO ROLLS. DIP IN BUTTER AND PUT IN PAN.  LET RISE AN HOUR
IN A WARM PLACE OR TILL DOUBLE IN SIZE.  BAKE AT 400 FOR 15 TO 20
MIN. OR TILL BROWN.
MIX ALL TOGETHER AND POUR INTO PIE SHELLS.  CHILL.

PUT BACON AND GREEN ONION IN BLENDER. COMBINE CREAM CHEESE AND SALAD
DRESSING.  ADD PARMASAN AND BACON-ONION MIXTURE.  FORM INTO A BALL.
SPRINKLE WITH PAPRIKA.

COMBINE INGREDIENTS IN SAUCEPAN.  COOK OVER LOW HEAT, STIRRING
FREQUENTLY, TILL SAUCE IS SMOOTH.  YOU CAN USE 1 CAN OF ROTEL
TOMATOES INSTEAD OF SALSA IF DESIRED.

IN A LARGE BOWL COMBINE CHEESE, CHILI PEPPERS, OLIVES, ONION, AND
MAYONNAISE.  GENTLY FOLD IN SHRIMP.  ARRANGE ABOUT 20 TORTILLA CHIPS
ON A 12 IN. MICROWAVE SAFE PLATTER.  TOP EACH CHIP WITH A ROUNDED
TEASPOON OF THE CHEESE MIXTURE.  COOK UNCOVERED ON HIGH FOR 1-2 MIN.
REPEAT WITH REMAINING CHIPS AND CHEESE MIXTURE.

MIX OIL, LEMON JUICE AND ACCENT.  POUR OVER VERMACELLI AND MARINATE
OVER NIGHT. COMBINE WITH REMAINING INGREDIENTS AND SEASON TO TASTE
WITH SALT, PEPPER AND GARLIC POWDER.  CHILL 2 MORE HOURS OR LONGER.
YOU CAN SUBSTITUTE HAM FOR SHRIMP IF DESIRED.

PREPARE WHIPPED TOPPING MIX WITH 1 CUP OF THE MILK AS DIRECTED ON
PACKAGE IN SMALL MIXER BOWL.  MEASURE 2 CUPS OF THE PREPARED WHIPPED
TOPPING AND SET ASIDE.  ADD 1 CUP OF THE MILK AND CHOCOLATE PIE
FILLING.  MIX TO REMAINING TOPPING IN BOWL.  BLEND; THEN BEAT AT HIGH
SPEED FOR 2 MIN. SPOON INTO PIE SHELL.  CLEAN BOWL AND BEATERS.
RETURN MEASURED WHIPPED TOPPING TO BOWL;  ADD REMAINING MILK, VANILLA
PIE FILLING MIX AND PEANUT BUTTER. BLEND; THEN BEAT AT HIGH SPEED FOR
2 MIN., SCRAPING BOWL OCCASIONALLY. SPOON INTO SHELL OVER CHOCOLATE
FILLING.  CHILL AT LEAST 4 HOURS OR FREEZE SEVERAL HOURS OR
OVERNIGHT.  GARNISH WITH CHOPPED OR WHOLE PEANUTS, IF DESIRED.

HEAT OVEN TO 375.  GREASE A 13X9 PAN.  IN MEDIUM SAUCEPAN, COMBINE
FIRST 4 INGREDIENTS.  COOK OVER MEDIUM HEAT, STIRRING CONSTANTLY,
JUST UNTIL MIXTURE BEGINS TO BUBBLE.  REMOVE FROM HEAT; COOL
SLIGHTLY; SET ASIDE. BEAT OLEO, SUGAR,AND VANILLA TILL FLUFFY.  ADD
REMAINING INGREDIENTS; BLEND UNTIL EVENLY MIXED AND CRUMBLY.  RESERVE
2 CUPS.  PRESS REMAINING MIXTURE ONTO BOTTOM OF PREPARED PAN.  SPREAD
RAISIN MIXTURE TO WITHIN 1/2 INCH OF EDGE. SPRINKLE WITH REMAINING
OAT MIXTURE; PAT LIGHTLY.  BAKE 25-30 MIN. OR TILL GOLDEN BROWN.
COOL COMPLETELY.  CUT INTO 1X2 INCH BARS.

SOFTEN CREAM CHEESE AND BEAT TILL LIGHT.  ADD MILK AND MIX WELL.
STIR IN JUICE.  POUR INTO CRUST.  CHILL SEVERAL HOURS.  TOP WITH
CHERRY PIE MIX. CHILL TILL FIRM.

IN SKILLET, COMBINE SALAD DRESSING, BROTH, RICE, CHILIES, CHILI
POWDER AND CUMIN;  MIX WELL.  TOP WITH CHICKEN.  BRING TO BOIL;
REDUCE HEAT.  COVER; SIMMER 25 MINUTES.  TOP WITH TOMATOES AND
OLIVES.  COVER;  CONTINUE COOKING 5 MINUTES.  REMOVE FROM HEAT.
SPRINKLE WITH CHEESE;  LET STAND 5 MINUTES OR TILL ALL LIQUID IS
ABSORBED.

MELT OLEO IN SHALLOW PAN IN OVEN.  ADD PARSLEY FLAKES, CELERY SALT,
GARLIC POWDER, CAYENNE AND HOT SAUCE.  MIX WELL.  ADD REST OF
INGREDIENTS.  HEAT IN 250 OVEN FOR 45 MIN.  STIRRING EVERY 15 MIN.

HEAT OVEN TO 350.  GREASE 13X9 DISH WITH OLEO.  SET ASIDE.  CHOP 1/2
C NUTS FOR TOPPING AND SET ASIDE.  CHOP REMAININ 1/2 C FINELY.  FOR
CRUST: COMBINE FLOUR AND BROWN SUGAR.  CUT IN OLEO UNTIL FINE CRUMBS
FORM.  ADD 1/2 C FINELY CHOPPED NUTS AND COCONUT.  MIX WELL.  REMOVE
1/2 CUP.  SET ASIDE. PRESS REMAINING CRUMBS IN BOTTOM OF PAN.  BAKE
AT 350 FOR 12 MIN. UNTIL EDGES ARE LIGHTLY BROWNED.  FOR FILLING:
BEAT CREAM CHEESE, SUGAR, EGGS,AND VANILLA IN SMALL BOWL AT MED.
SPEED TILL SMOOTH.  SPREAD OVER HOT BAKED CRUST.  RETURN TO OVEN.
BAKE 15 MIN LONGER.  SPREAD CHERRY PIE FILLING OVER CHEESE LAYER.
COMBINE RESERVED COARSELY CHOPPED NUTS AND RESERVED CRUMBS.  SPRINKLE
EVENLY OVER CHERRIES.  RETURN TO OVEN.  BAKE 15 MIN. LONGER.  COOL.
REFRIGERATE SEVERAL HOURS.  CUT INTO BARS.

MIX ALL INGREDIENTS TOGETHER WELL.  STORE IN A COVERED, MOISTURE-PROOF
CONTAINER.  USE 2 OR 3 TEASPOONS FOR EACH CUP OF BOILING WATER

BAKE POTATOES AT 400 FOR 1 HR.  CUT THIN SLICE OFF TOP, SCOOP OUT
POTATOES AND MASH WITH FORK.  STIR IN REMAINING INGREDIENTS INCLUDING
CHEDDAR CHEESE.  REFILL POTATOES AND SPRINKLE WITH ADDITIONAL CHEESE
IF DESIRED. REHEAT IN 400 OVEN FOR 10 MIN. OR TILL HEATED THROUGH.

STIR FIRST 5 INGREDIENTS THEN ADD WATER AND EGG.  STIR UNTIL SMOOTH.
POUR ABOUT 1 QT. OF CORN OIL INTO LARGE SKILLET HEAT OVER MED. HEAT
TO 375.  DIP 4 CUPS OF CUT UP VEGETABLES SUCH AS SQUASH, CARROTS,
MUSHROOMS, ONIONS OR BONELESS CHICKEN CUT INTO CUBES, A FEW AT A
TIME, INTO THE BATTER.  STIR BATTER OFTEN.  CAREFULLY ADD VEGETABLES
OR CHICKEN TO HOT OIL A FEW PIECES AT A TIME.  FRY 2 OR 3 MIN.
TURNING ONCE UNTIL GOLDEN BROWN AND CRISP. DRAIN ON PAPER TOWELS.

MELT OLEO IN SAUCEPAN AND BLEND IN FLOUR.  ADD MILK AND OTHER
INGREDIENTS.
COOK OVER MED. HEAT TILL THICK, STIRRING CONSTANTLY.  SERVE OVER
COOKED AND DRAINED VEGETABLES.  SEASON WITH SALT AND PEPPER AS
DESIRED.

COOK BACON IN LARGE SKILLETTILL CRISP.  DRAIN. COOK ONION AND OKRA IN
DRIPPINGS.  DRAIN .  PLACE IN 1 1/2 QT. LIGHTLY GREASED CASSEROLE.
ADD GREEN PEPPER, RICE, CRUMBLED BACON AND MIX WELL.  COMBINE
TOMATOES, SUGAR, GARLIC SALT, SALT AND PEPPER IN BLENDER AND BLEND ON
LOW SPEED 1 OR 2 MIN; POUR OVER MIXTURE IN CASSEROLE.  TOP WITH
PARMESAN CHEESE.  COMBINE CRUMBS AND OLEO AND SPREAD ON TOP.  BAKE AT
350 FOR 45 MIN.

BROWN SAUSAGE AND MEAT.  POUR OFF EXCESS FAT.  ADD ONIONS AND CELERY
AND CONTINUE COOKIN. COOK RICE IN CHICKEN BROTH WITH SALT.  ADD TO
MEAT MIXTURE.  MIX EVERYTHING TOGETHER.  FRESH PARSLEY MAY BE ADDED
IF DESIRED.

SPREAD JALAPENA REFRIED BEANS ON FLOUR TORTILLAS. PUT SOME TACO MEAT
THEN CHEESE AND ROLL THEM UP.  PLACE IN BAKING DISH.  PUT CHILI,
ONIONS, PEPPERS AND CHEESE ON TOP.  BAKE TILL WARM.
MIX ALL TOGETHER AND PUT IN CASSEROLE.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 45 MIN.

MIX ALL INGREDIENTS TOGETHER.  SEASON WITH SALT AND PEPPER.  BAKE AT
350 FOR 1 HOUR .

BROWN STEAK STRIPS IN OIL.  SET ASIDE AND SAUTE ONIONS AND PEPPER AND
CELERY TILL TENDER.  ADD CHOPPED ROTELS AND 1 CAN HOT WATER.  ADD
STEAK AND SIMMER TILL TENDER.  SERVE OVER RICE.

MIX CAKE MIX LESS 1 CUP,1 EGG AND MELTED OLEO  AND PRESS INTO THE
BOTTOM OF A 9X13 GREASED DISH.  BLEND YAMS, BROWN SUGAR, MILK, SPICE
AND 2 EGGS. POUR OVER MIXED CAKE.  CRUMBLE THE RESERVED CAKE MIX,
CINNAMON, PECANS, SUGAR AND 1/2 C. OLEO TOGETHER.  SPRINKLE ON TOP.
BAKE AT 350 FOR 55-60 MIN.

PREPARE PUDDING MIX AS DIRECTED ON BOX.  COOL.  STIR IN CAKE MIX TILL
BLENDED.  POUR INTO GREASED AND FLOURED 9 X 12 PAN.  SPRINKLE NUTS AND
CHIPS ON TOP.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 35-40 MIN.

MELT PEANUT BUTTER AND OLEO IN DOUBLE BROILER.  ADD GRAHAM CRACKER
CRUMBS, COCONUT, PECANS AND POWDERED SUGAR.  FORM INTO SMALL BALLS;
CHILL.  MELT CHIPS IN DOUBLE BROILER.  DIP BALLS IN MELTED CHIPS AND
PLACE ON WAX PAPER TO DRY.
MIX PUDDING IN FRUIT.  FOLD IN DREAM WHIP.  ICE ANGEL FOOD CAKE.

COOK BROCCOLI TILL ALMOST TENDER AND DRAIN.  ADD OLEO AND SALT TO
TASTE. COOK PEAS ACCORDING TO DIRECTIONS.  MIX SOUP, MAYONAISE,
CHEESE, WATER CHESTNUTS, POULTRY SEASONING AND LEMON JUICE.  COOK
OVER LOW HEAT TILL CHEESE IS MELTED.  ARRANGE BROCCOLI IN 9X13 DISH.
MIX PEAS WITH 1 C. OF SAUCE AND PUT OVER BROCCOLI.  PUT CHICKEN
PIECES NEXT.  COVER WITH REMAINING SAUCE.  COVER WITH TOPPING AND
BAKE AT 350 FOR 30-40 MIN. TOPPING:  MELT OLEO IN SKILLET OVER LOW
HEAT.  ADD CRUMBS AND STIR TO MIX.
COOL BEFORE SPRINKLING ON TOP OF DISH.

SLICE BANANAS,  POUR DRAINED PINEAPPLE JUICE OVER THEM AND SET ASIDE.
MIX TOGETHER IN A LARGE BOWL: PIE FILLING, STRAWBERRIES, PINEAPPLE
AND MANDARIN ORANGES AND FINALLY THE BANANAS WITH PINEAPPLE JUICE.
COVER AND REFRIGERATE.  WILL THICKEN IN REFRIGERATOR.

PUT ALL INGREDIENT IN CROCK POT.  COVER AND COOK LOW 10-12 HOURS OR
HIGH 3-4 HOURS.  STIR OCCASIONALLY.

BROWN BEEF AND DRAIN.  POUR ALL INGREDIENTS IN A CROCK POT AND COOK
ON LOW 6-8 HOURS OR ON HIGH 3.

THOROUGHLY COMBINE ALL INGREDIENTS IN LIGHTLY OILED CROCK POT.
SEASON TO TASTE WITH SALT AND PEPPER.  COOK ON LOW 6-1O HOURS.  SERVE
OVER BISCUITS, TOAST OR WAFFLES.

PLACE MEAT IN CROCK POT.  MIX FLOUR, SALT,AND PEPPER.  POUR OVER
MEAT, STIR TO COAT.  ADD REMAINING INGREDIENTS AND STIR TO MIX WELL.
COVER AND COOK ON LOW 10-12 HOURS OR HIGH 4-6.  STIR STEW BEFORE
SERVING.

PLACE CABBAGE IN CROCK POT.  TOSS WITH POTATO, SALT AND CARAWAY SEED.
ADD ONION AND SAUSAGE.  POUR BROTH OVER ALL.  STIR LIGHTLY, COVER.
COOK LOW 6-10 HOURS OR ON HIGH 2-4.

1 ea

DO NOT REFRIGERATE FRUIT WHILE FERMENTING.  KEEP IN LARGE GLASS JAR 1
(GAL).  LID SHOULD REMAIN ON JAR DURING THIS TIME.  CAN TAKE LID OFF
TO STIR, THEN REPLACE.  STEP ONE:  1 1/2 CUPS STARTER JUICE, 2 1/2
CUPS SUGAR, 29 OZ CAN SLICED PEACHES CHOPPED WITH JUICE.  MIX THIS
TOGETHER AND STIR ONCE A DAY FOR 10 DAYS.  STIP 2:  ADD 2 1/2 CUPS
SUGAR, 29 OZ CHUNK PINEAPPLE WITH JUICE ( CUT CHUNKS IN HALF).  STIR
ONCE A DAY FOR 10 DAYS. STEP 3:  ADD 2 1/2 C SUGAR, 29 OZ MARASCHINO
CHERRIES CHOPPED WITH JUICE. STEP 4:  DRAIN LIQUID FROM FRUIT.  FRUIT
IS FOR CAKE.  LIQUID IS FOR 1 1/2 CUPS STARTER FOR YOURSELF AND 1 1/2
CUPS FOR FRIENDS. CAKE:  MAKE EACH CAKE AS FOLLOWS:  SHOULD MAKE 4 OR
5 CAKES.  1 1/2 CUPS FRUIT FOR EACH CAKE. ONE BOX DUNCAN HINES DELUX
CAKE MIX (CHERRY, PINEAPPLE, STRAWBERRY) YOUR CHOICE.  1 SMALL PKG.
INSTANT VANILLA PUDDING MIX, 4 EGGS, 2/3 C COOKING OIL, 1 OR 2 CUPS
CHOPPED PECANS.  BLEND CAKE MIX AND PUDDING MIX. ADD EGGS AND OIL.
BEAT ON LOW SPEED TILL SMOOTH. ADD FRUIT AND NUTS AND MIX BY HAND.
BAKE IN GREASED AND FLOURED TUBE PAN. AT 325 FOR 1 HOUR. OR UNTIL
DONE WHEN TOOTHPICK INSERTED IN CAKE COMES OUT CLEAN. ICING: 8 OZ.
CREAM CHEESE, 1/2 C. OLEO, 1 LB. POWDERED SUGAR, 1 t. VANILLA. CREAM
TILL SMOOTH AND ADD 1 C. CHOPPED NUTS.  COOL CAKE BEFORE ICING.

MELT CHIPS AND PEANUT BUTTER TOGETHER IN TOP OF DOUBLE BOILER.  REMOVE
FROM HEAT AND ADD NOODLES STIRRING EASILY TO KEEP FROM BREAKING THE
NOODLES.  ADD MARSHMALLOWS LAST (TO HAVE GIVEN A LITTLE TIME TO COOL
SO THEY WON'T MELT) AND DROP BY SPOON ONTO WAX PAPER.

CREAM TOGETHER:  OLEO, SUGAR, EGGS AND VANILLA TILL LIGHT AND FLRFFY.
MIX DRY INGREDIENTS AND ADD TO CREAMED MIXTURE ALTERNATELY WITH
BUTTERMILK. BEAT JUST TILL BLENDED AFTER EACH ADDITION.  FOLD IN NUTS
AND CHERRIES. POUR BATTER INTO GREASED LOAF PAN.  BAKE AT 350 FOR
55-60 MIN.  LET STAND 10 MIN.  REMOVE FROM PAN; COOL ON WIRE RACK.
MIX POWDERED SUGAR, VANILLA AND MILK AND DRIZZLE OVER COOLED LOAF.

MIX TOGETHER, MARSHMALLOWS, CAN MILK, ORANGE PEEL, AND JUICE.  IN A
LARGE MIXING BOWL, COMBINE REMAINING INGREDIENTS.  ADD MILK MIXTURE;
BLEND WELL. PRESS MIXTURE INTO MOLD.  CHILL OVERNIGHT.  UNMOLD TO
SERVE.

PLACE FIRST 3 INGREDIENTS IN HEAVY SAUCEPAN.  COVER AND PLACE OVER
LOW HEAT 10 MIN.  UNCOVER.  STIR AND HEAT SLOWLY TILL SMOOTH.  ADD
COCONUT; STIR TILL COCONUT IS EVENLY COATED WITH CHOCOLATE.  PRESS
OVER BOTTOM AND UP SIDES OF A BUTTERED 9 IN. PIE PLATE.  CHILL TILL
SET.  SPOON ICE CREAM INTO SHELL.  FREEZE.  SERVE WITH SAUCE.  SAUCE:
COMBINE  CANDIES, 1/4 C. HALF AN HALF , KARO AND CREAM OF TARTAR  IN
SMALL SAUCE PAN.  COVER. PLACE OVER LOW HEAT 10 MIN.  UNCOVER STIR
AND HEAT SLOWLY TILL CHOCOLATE IS MELTED. AND SMOOTH.  CHILL .  ADD
3-4 T. HALF AND HALF TO THIN TO DESIRED CONSISTENCY.  MAKES ABOUT 1
1/4 CUPS SAUCE.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 375.  IN SMALL BOWL, COMBINE FLOUR, BAKING SODA,
BAKING POWDER AND SALT; SET ASIDE.  IN LARGE BOWL, COMBINE PEANUT
BUTTER, BUTTER, SUGAR, BROWN SUGAR AND VANILLA; BEAT UNTIL CREAMY.
BEAT IN MILK AND EGG. GRADUALLY ADD FLOUR MIXTURE; MIX WELL.  STIR IN
CHOCOLATE CHIPS AND PEANUTS.  DROP ON UNGREASED COOKIE SHEETS BY
SPOON.  BAKE 10-12 MIN.

COMBINE TAPIOCA, SALT AND PEPPER IN SAUCEPAN; ADD MILK.  COOK AND
STIR OVER MEDIUM HEAT TILL MIXTURE COMES TO A BOIL.  STIR IN OLEO.
REMOVE FROM HEAT AND COOL SLIGHTLY.  MEANWHILE, BEAT EGG WHITES TILL
STIFF.  BEAT EGG YOLKS TILL THICK AND LEMON COLORED.  GRADUALLY BLEND
TAPIOCA MIXTURE INTO EGG YOLKS; FOLD INTO EGG WHITES.  POUR INTO A
HOT BUTTERED 10 IN. SKILLET.
COOK OVER LOW HEAT FOR 3 MIN.  THEN BAKE AT 350 FOR 15 MIN. OR TILL A
KNIFE INSERTED IN CENTER COMES OUT CLEAN.  CUT ACROSS AT RIGHT ANGLE
TO HANDLE OF PAN, BEING CAREFUL NOT TO CUT ALL THE WAY THROUGH.
CAREFULLY FOLD FROM HANDLE TO OPPOSITE SIDE, AND TURN OUT ONTO
SERVING PLATTER. FOR A CHEESE OMLET, PREPART OMELET AS DIRECTED,
ADDING 1/2 C GRATED AMERICAN CHEESE WITH THE BUTTER.  REMOVE FROM
HEAT AND STIR TILL CHEESE IS MELTED.

THAW CORN, DRAINING WELL.  MIX FLOUR WITH BAKING POWDER, SALT AND
PEPPER. ADD MILK AND SHORTENING TO EGGS;  ADD TO DRY INGREDIENTS,
BLENDING WELL. STIR IN CORN.  DROP BATTER FROM TABLESPOON INTO ABOUT
1/2 IN. OF HOT FAT IN A SKILLET.  FRY FRITTERS UNTIL GOLDEN BROWN ON
BOTH SIDES, ABOUT 5 MIN.
DRAIN ON ABSORBENT PAPER.  SERVE WITH SYRUP.  MAKES 10-12 FRITTERS.

BROWN MEAT WITH CHOPPED ONIONS; DRAIN WELL.  ADD TACO MIX, TOMATO
SAUCE AND WATER.  MIX WELL.  BRING TO A BOIL; REDUCE HEAT AND SIMMER
FOR 15 MIN. UNCOVERED.  ADD 3 0R 4 HANDFULLS CRUSHED TORTILLA CHIPS.
MIX. POUR INTO CASSEROLE AND BAKE AT 400 FOR 10 OR 15 MIN. TOP WITH
CHEESE

SIFT FLOUR WITH SUGAR, BAKING POWDER AND SALT; STIR IN COCONUT AND
ORANGE RIND.  COMBINE EGG, MILK AND VANILLA; STIR INTO FLOUR MIXTURE.
(DO NOT BEAT.)  POUR INTO GREASED LOAF PAN.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 1 HOUR
AND 10 MIN., OR TILL CAKE TESTER INSERTED IN CENTER COMES OUT CLEAN.
COOL IN PAN 10 MIN; REMOVE FROM PAN AND FINISH COOLING ON RACK.  TO
TOAST COCONUT THINLY SPREAD COCONUT IN SHALLOW BAKING PAN.  TOAST AT
350 FOR 7-12 MIN, OR UNTIL LIGHTLY BROWNED.  STIR COCONUT OR SHAKE
PAN OFTEN TO TOAST EVENLY.

SIFT FLOUR WITH BAKING POWDER AND SALT; MIX IN BROWN SUGAR.  COMBINE
EGG AND MILK.  ADD TO FLOUR MIXTURE WITH SHORTENING; MIX JUST ENOUGH
TO DAMPEN DRY INGREDIENTS.  STIR IN NUTS.  POUR INTO A LOAF PAN THAT
HAS BEEN LINED WITH WAX PAPER.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 1 HOUR AND 5 MIN., OR
TILL CAKE TESTER INSERTED IN CENTER COMES OUT CLEAN.  COOL IN PAN 10
MIN.  REMOVE FROM PAN AND FINISH COOLING ON RACK.  IF DESIRED YOU MAY
REDUCE NUTS TO 1/2 C AND FOLD IN 1 C. FINELY CUT DATES.

DISSOLVE 1 PK. JELLO IN 1 C. BOILING WATER IN BOWL.  ADD ORANGE JUICE.
CHILL UNTIL PARTIALLY SET.  BLEND CREAM CHEESE INTO WHIPPED TOPPING.
FOLD INTO GELATIN MIXTURE.  POUR INTO 9X13 DISH. CHILL TILL FIRM.
DISSOLVE THE OTHER PKG. OF JELLO IN BOILING WATER.  STIR IN PIE
FILLING.  POUR OVER CONGEALED LALYER.  CHILL TILL FIRM.

BEAT CREAM CHEESE WITH SUGAR AND RUM EXTRACT IN BOWL TILL SMOOTH.
FOLD IN 2 CUPS WHIPPED TOPPIING, PINEAPPLE WITH SYRUP AND 2 CUPS
COCONUT. SPREAD IN 8 IN. SQUARE PAN LINED WITH PLASTIC WRAP.  FREEZE
FOR 2 HOURS OR TILL FIRM. INVERT ONTO SERVING DISH; SPREAD WITH
REMAINING WHIPPED TOPPING SPRINKLE WITH REMAINING 2/3 C. COCONUT.
CUT INTO SQUARES.  GARNISH WITH PINEAPPLE AND CHERRIES.

COMBINE FIRST 4 INGREDIENTS IN SAUCEPAN.  COOK TILL THICK AND SMOOTH,
STIRRING CONSTANTLY.  COOL.  MIX VANILLA WAFER CRUMBS AND 1/2 C. OLEO
IN BOWL.  PRESS OVER BOTTOM OF 9X13 DISH.  BEAT CREAM CHEESE AND 1/4
C OLEO IN BOWL; BLEND WELL.  ADD 2/3 C PINEAPPLE; MIX WELL. SPREAD
OVER CRUST. SLICE BANANAS 1/2 IN. THICK.  DRIZZLE WITH LEMON JUICE;
DRAIN WELL. ARRANGE OVER CREAM CHEESE LAYER.  TOP WITH CHOCOLATE
SAUCE.  SPRINKLE PECANS OVER SAUCE. SPREAD WHIPPED TOPPING OVER ALL.
SPRINKLE WITH REMAINING PINEAPPLE AND CHERRIES.  CHILL FOR SEVERAL
HOURS.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  CUT MARGARINE INTO FLOUR IN BOWL TILL CRUMBLY.
STIR IN 1 C. PECANS.  PAT INTO 9X12 BAKING DISH.  BAKE FOR 20 MIN.
COOL.  BEAT CREAM CHEESE WITH CONF. SUGAR IN BOWL TILL LIGHT AND
FLUFFY.  ADD 2 C. WHIPPED TOPPING; MIX GENTLY.  SPREAD ON COOLED
CRUST.  SPOON PIE FILLING ON TOP.  PREPARE PUDDING MIX USING PACKAGE
DIRECTIONS.  SPREAD OVER PIE FILLING.  TOP WITH REMAINING 2 CUPS
WHIPPED TOPPING AND ADDITIONAL PECANS.
CHILL UNTIL SERVING TIME.

DISSOLVE YEAST IN WARM WATER IN BOWL.  COMBINE OLEO AND SUGAR IN LARGE
BOWL.  ADD EGG AND YEAST.  ADD SELF-RISING FLOUR 1 CUP AT A TIME,
MIXING WELL AFTER EACH ADDITION.  COVER WITH FOIL.  REFRIGERATE
OVERNIGHT. PREHEAT OVEN TO 400.  DROP BY SPOONFULS INTO GREASED
MUFFIN CUPS.  BAKE FOR 20 MIN.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 375.  MIX SOUP, VELVEETA CHEESE, CHILIES, MILK AND
SALAD DRESSING MIX IN MEDIUM SAUCEPAN.  COOK OVER MEDIUM HEAT JUST
TILL CHEESE IS MELTED, STIRRING CONSTANTLY.  SAUTE ONION IN CORN OIL
OR BUTTER IN SKILLET.  ADD TURKEY, DRY TACO SEASONING AND CHEDDAR
CHEESE TO ONION. HEAT CHICKEN BROTH IN SHALLOW SAUCEPAN.  DIP CORN
TORTILLAS INTO HOT BROTH TO SOFTEN.  REMOVE FROM BROTH.  ADD SPOONFUL
TURKEY MIXTURE; ROLL TO ENCLOSE FILLING.  PLACE IN 9X13 DISH SPRAYED
WITH PAM.  POUR SOUP MIXTURE OVER TOP; COVER WITH FOIL.  BAKE FOR
20-25 MIN.

PROCESS CHOCOLATE CHIPS IN A FOOD PROCESSOR TILL THEY ARE VERY FINE.
HEAT CREAM TO BOILING THEN ADD TO CHOCOLATE IN PROCESSOR THROUGH THE
SHOOT. PROCESS TILL CHOCOLATE IS MELTED AND ALL IS SMOOTH AND CREAMY.
POUR INTO A BOWL AND COOL TILL THICK ENOUGH TO USE AS A FROSTING.
YOU MAY VARY THE PROPORTIONS TO MAKE IT DIFFERENT CONSISTENCIES.  IT
MAY ALSO BE USED AS A PIE FILLING OR PUDDING.

IN COVERED SAUCEPAN, COOK EGGPLANT IN BOILING WATER TILL TENDER ABOUT
5 MIN.  DRAIN.  STIR IN CRUMBS, CHEESE, EGGS, PARSLEY, ONIONS,
GARLIC, SALT AND PEPPER. COOK IN HOT OIL ABOUT 3 MIN. ON EACH SIDE OR
TILL GOLDEN BROWN.

REMOVE STEMS FROM EGGPLANT.  WASH AND DROP INTO BOILING WATER TO BOIL
ABOUT 30 MIN.  DRAIN AND CUT IN HALF.  REMOVE PULP LEAVING SHELL
THICK ENOUGH TO PREVENT BREAKING.  COOK ONION AND GREEN PEPPER IN
OLEO FOR 5 MIN. ADD BREAD CRUMBS, GRATED CHEESE, SALT AND CATSUP. ADD
THE WELL DRAINED EGGPLANT PULP AND PILE LIGHTLY IN EGGPLANT SHELLS.
TOP WITH BUTTERED BREAD CRUMBS. PLACE IN GREASED PAN AND BAKE AT 350
FOR ABOUT 20 MIN.

BOIL EGGPLANT AND DRAIN WELL.  SAUTE ONION, CELERY, BELL PEPPER AND
SHRIMP IN MARGARINE.  COOK TILL TENDER.  MIX TOGETHER EGGS AND BREAD
CRUMBS.  ADD EGGPLANT AND SHRIMP MIXTURE.  SEASON WITH SALT AND
PEPPER TO TASTE.  MIX WELL.  BAKE IN BUTTERED DISH AT 350 FOR 5 MIN.

PEEL, CUT AND COOK EGGPLANT TILL SOFT.  DRAIN AND MASH.  ADD EGG,
FLOUR, BAKING POWDER, AND MILK.  SEASON WITH SALT AND PEPPER TO
TASTE.  MIX WELL. DROP BY SPOONFULS INTO HOT GREASE AND DEEP FRY TILL
DONE.

PARE AND SLICE EGGPLANT INTO 1 1/2 QT. BAKING DISH.  SPRINKLE WITH
SALT, ADD ORANGE JUICE AND ONION SLICES.  BAKE IN 375 OVEN FOR 1
HOUR.  BASTE OCCASIONALLY WITH LIQUID IN PAN.

PEEL AND CUT EGGPLANT IN PIECES.  SOAK IN SALT WATER FOR 10 MIN.
DRAIN. ADD FRESH WATER AND COOK TILL TENDER.  CRUMBLE CORN BREAD AND
ADD ALL INGREDIENTS.  SEASON WITH SALT AND PEPPER TO TASTE.  ADD 4
WELL BEATEN EGGS LAST.  BAKE AT 400 FOR 10 MIN.  SPRINKLE WITH GRATED
VELVEETA CHEESE.
RETURN TO OVEN FOR 10 MORE MIN.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  IN LARGE BOWL, BEAT PEANUT BUTTER AND BUTTER
TILL SMOOTH, ABOUT 1 MIN.  ADD SUGAR, EGGS AND VANILLA; BEAT TILL
CREAMY. BLEND IN FLOUR AND SALT.  STIR IN 1 C. CHOCOLATE CHIPS.
SPREAD INTO UNGREASED 13X9 PAN.  BAKE 25-30 MIN. OR TILL EDGES BEGIN
TO BROWN. IMMEDIATELY SPRINKLE REMAINING CHOCOLATE CHIPS OVER COOKIE
LAYER.  LET STAND 5 MIN. TILL CHIPS BECOME SHINY AND SOFT.  SPREAD
CHIPS EVENLY OVER TOP. COOL COMPLETELY.  CUT INTO 1 1/2 IN. BARS.

MIX TOGETHER SUGAR, WATER AND CHOCOLATE SYRUP IN A HEAVY SAUCEPAN.
COOK OVER MED. HEAT, STIRRING CONSTANTLY TILL SUGAR DISSOLVES AND
MIXTURE BOILS. THEN COOK TO HARD BALL STAGE (250) WITHOUT STIRRING.
REMOVE PAN FROM HEAT. BEAT EGG WHITES TILL STIFF.  POUR HOT SYRUP IN
A THIN STREAM OVER BEATEN EGG WHITES, BEATING CONSTANTLY AT HIGH
SPEED TILL MIXTURE FORMS PEAKS WHEN DROPPED FROM SPOON (ABOUT 10
MIN.)  QUICKLY STIR IN VANILLA AND MELTED CHOCOLATE BY HAND.  STIR IN
NUTS.  DROP BY TEASPOON ONTO WAX PAPER. COOL.

BOIL 3 C SUGAR, 1/4 C WHITE KARO, 1.8 t SODA AND 1 C CREAM TO A
LITTLE OVER SOFT BALL STAGE.  ABOUT 240.  COOL, STIR AND CREAM UP
LIKE CHOCOLATE DROP CENTERS.  WORK WITH HANDS AND SHAPE INTO LOGS.
CARAMEL PART: COOK 1 1/2 C WHITE SUGAR, 3/4 C WHITE KARO, 1/4 LB
OLEO,  AND 1 C. SWEET CREAM. COOK SLOWLY, STIRRING CONSTANTLY TO 240.
REMOVE FROM HEAT AND ADD VANILLA.DIP ROLLS IN HOT CARAMEL, THEN ROLL
IN PECANS.  PRESS NUTS INTO CARAMEL WITH HANDS.  COOL, WRAP IN
PLASTIC WRAP.  KEEP COOL.  SLICE INTO 1 IN. PIECES.

MIX SUGAR AND BUTTERMILK WITH SODA IN IT, BUTTER, SALT AND SYRUP.
COOK TILL IT FORMS A RATHER HARD BALL WHEN DROPPED IN WATER.  ADD
VANILLA AND PECANS.  STIR A SHORT TIME COOL RAPIDLY AND DROP ON  WAX
PAPER.

CREAM BUTTER AND SUGAR AND MILK TILL WELL BLENDED.  ADD PECANS. ROLL
INTO BALLS AND PLACE ON WAX PAPER.  MELT CHOCOLATE CHIPS OVER DOUBLE
BOILER. DIP BALLS IN CHOCOLATE AND PLACE ON WAX PAPER TO COOL.

MIX ALL INGREDIENTS EXCEPT OLEO AND PECANS.  COOK TO SOFT BALL (232).
REMOVE FROM HEAT ADD OLEO AND PECANS.  BEAT AND DROP BY TEASPON ON
WAXED PAPER.

IN TOP OF DOUBLE BOILER MELT CHOCOLATE.  REMOVE FROM HEAT, STIR IN
EAGLE BRAND AND PEANUTS.  BE SURE TO COVER ALL NUTS WITH MIXTURE.
DROP BY TEASPOON ON WAXED PAPER.

MELT CHIPS OVER HOT WATER.  STIR IN CAN MILK AND VANILLA.  ADD NUTS
MIX WELL.  CHILL TILL FIRM ENOUGH TO HANDLE.  FORM INTO ROLL ON WAX
PAPER  TO SHAPE.  MARK SURFACE LENGTHWISE WITH TINES OF FORK.  BRUSH
WITH EGG WHITES PRESS PECANS OVER SURFACE.

COMBINE POPCORN AND PECANS IN A GREASED 15X10X1 PAN.  MIX WELL AND SET
ASIDE.  MELT OLEO OVER LOW HEAT ADD SUGAR, SYRUP AND SALT BRING TO A
BOIL AND BOIL 5 MIN.  WITHOUT STIRRING.  REMOVE FROM HEAT STIR IN
SODA AND VANILLA.  POUR SYRUP OVER POPCORN STIRRING TILL EVENLY
COATED.. BAKE AT 300 FOR 30 MIN STIRRING AFTER EACH 15 MIN.

MIX SUGAR, PUDDING, MILK AND OLEO.  COOK AND STIR TILL SUGAR IS
DISSOLVED.
BOIL GENTLY TILL IT FORMS A SOFT BALL WHEN PUT IN COOL WATER.  ADD
NUTS AND MIX WELL.  REMOVE FROM FIRE, BEAT TILL IT BEGINS TO THICKEN,
NO LONGER.
DROP BY TEASPOON ON WAX PAPER AND LET STAND TILL FIRM.

MELT OVER WARM WATER THE EAGLE BRAND, CHOCOLATE CHIPS AND OLEO.  ADD
MARSHMALLOWS AND NUTS.  STIR WELL PUT IN GREASED 9X13 PAN. COOL.

CREAM OLEO; ADD SUGAR;  BEAT TILL LIGHT AND FLUFFY.  ADD EGGS AND
BEAT. COMBINE FLOUR, SODA AND SALT AND ADD TO CREAMED MIXTURE, MIXING
WELL. STIR IN VANILLA, CHOCOLATE CHIPS AND PECANS.  DIVIDE MIXTURE
INTO THIRDS. SPOON 1/3 ONTO UNGREASED PAN (8 1/2-INCH CIRCLE) OR USE
PIZZA FOIL PANS. BAKE AT 375 FOR 12-14 MIN.  COOL ON WIRE RACK.

BAKE ANGELFOOD ACCORDING TO PKG. DIRECTIONS. CRUMB DARK BROWN FROM
EDGES OF CAKE.  BREAK CAKE INTO BITE SIZE PIECES.  LINE A 13X9 PAN
WITH LAYER OF CAKE PIECES.  MIX TOGETHER THE YOGURT, STRAWBERRIES AND
COOL WHIP.  ADD A LAYER OF THE MIXTURE TO THE FIRST LAYER OF CAKE IN
PAN.  ALTERNATE ANOTHER LAYER OF CAKE AND MIXTURE.  ENDING WITH THE
LAST LAYER BEING THE MIXTURE. REFRIGERATE UNTIL READY TO SERVE.
OTHER FRUIT WITH CORRESPONDING FLAVOR YOGURT MAY BE SUBSTITUTED FOR
STRAWBERRIES.

name: SHEILA'S PEANUT BUTTER CHIP CHOCOLATE COOKIES
author: SHEILA FI

instructions.content:
CREAM OLEO, SUGAR, EGGS, AND VANILLA TILL LIGHT AND FLUFFY.  COMBINE
FLOUR, COCOA, BAKING SODA AND SALT; ADD TO CREAMED MIXTURE.  STIR IN
PEANUT BUTTER CHIPS.  DROP BY TEASPOONFUL ONTO UNGREASED COOKIE
SHEET, OR CHILL TILL FIRM ENOUGH TO HANDLE AND SHAPE SMALL AMOUNTS OF
DOUGH INTO 1- INCH BALLS. PLACE ON UNGREASED COOKIE SHEET AND FLATTEN
SLIGHTLY WITH FORK. BAKE AT 350 FOR 8 TO 10 MIN.  COOL 1 MIN. BEFORE
REMOVING FROM COOKIE SHEET ONTO WIRE RACK.

MIX TOGETHER PEANUT BUTTER, POWDERED SUGAR AND SOFT OLEO.  ADD RICE
KRISPIES.  ROLL INTO BALLS THE SIZE OF WALNUTS.  SET FOR SEVERAL
HOURS OR IN REFRIGERATOR OVERNIGHT.  MELT ALMOND BARK OR HERSHEY BAR
IN DOUBLE BIOLER OR MICROWAVE.  DROP IN BALLS AND COVER COMPLETELY.
PLACE ON WAX PAPER TILL BARK HARDENS.

DRAIN AND MASH SWEET POTATOES.  COMBINE POTATOES WITH  MARSHMALLOWS,
1 T OLEO, SALT AND PEPPER.  SHAPE INTO 12 BALLS.  PLACE IN AN 8X12
BAKING DISH. COVER AND REFRIGERATE OVERNIGHT.  COMBINE HONEY AND 1
T.OLEO AND HEAT. ROLL BALLS IN HONEY AND OLEO. THEN  ROLL IN CHOPPED
PECANS.  PLACE IN BAKING DISH.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 25 TO 30 MIN. OR TILL
HEATED THROUGH.

DRAIN AND REMOVE BONES AND SKIN FROM SALMON.  FLAKE.  BEAT EGGS AND
ADD TO MILK, THEN ADD TO SALMON.  ADD SEASONINGS AND CRACKER CRUMBS.
FORM INTO SIX LARGE PATTIES.  PLACE IN HOT SHORTENING AND FRY ON BOTH
SIDES TILL BROWN.

SIFT FLOUR AND SALT INTO A BOWL.  TAKE OUT 1/3 C.  OF THIS FLOUR AND
MIX WIH THE 1/4 C. WATER TO FORM A PASTE. CUT SHORTENING INTO
REMAINING FLOUR UNTIL THE PIECES ARE THE SIZE OF SMALL PEAS.  ADD
FLOUR PASTE TO BLENDED SHORTENING AND FLOUR MIXTURE.  MIX WITH A FORK
UNTIL THE DOUGH COMES TOGETHER AND CAN BE SHAPED INTO A BALL.  DIVIDE
IN HALF, ROLL OUT BOTH CRUSTS ABOUT 1/8 IN. THICK.

BEAT EGGS, SUGAR, SODA AND SALT TILL FLUFFY.  BEAT IN 1 CUP FLOUR.
ADD PINEAPPLE THEN STIR IN 1 MORE CUP OF FLOUR.  ADD NUTS.  POUR INTO
GREASED AND FLOURED JELLY ROLL PAN.  BAKE AT 350 FOR 25 MIN.
FROSTINTG:  BEAT CREAM CHEESE, OLEO, POWDERED SUGAR, VANILLA AND MILK
OR LEMON JUICE AND BEAT TILL SMOOTH.  SPREAD ON COOLED CAKE AND
SPRINKLE WITH CHOPPED NUTS.

COMBINE ALL INGREDIENTS AND MIX THOROUGHLY.  CHILL BEFORE SPREADING.
MAKES 3 CUPS.

WASH POTATOES AND CUT INTO WEDGES.  MIX OIL AND LIPTON SOUP AND
SPREAD ON POTATOES.  SPRINKLE WITH  MRS. DASH AND GARLIC POWDER.
BAKE 1 HOUR AT 400.

BEAT CR. CHEESE AND BLEND IN POWDERED SUGAR AND MIRACLE WHIP. FOLD IN
WHIPPED CREAM.  ADD LARGE CAN FRUIT COCKTAIL WELL DRAINED.  ADD ONE
BANANA JUST BEFORE SERVING.  GARNISH WITH CHERRIES.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 275.  PUT ALL INGREDIENTS IN DUTCH OVEN OR SMALL
ROASTER. COVER AND BAKE 5 HOURS.  DON'T LOOK.
BEAT TILL THICK.

MIX GROUND MEAT, PEPPER, SALT, OATMEAL, ONION AND MILK AND MAKE INTO
BALLS. PLACE IN GREASED CASSEROLE.  MIX REMAINING INGREDIENTS AND
POUR OVER MEAT BALLS AND BAKE 1 HOUR AT 350.  THESE CAN BE MADE AHEAD
AND FROZEN. MAKES 25-30 MEAT BALLS.

LINE LARGE ROASTING PAN WITH HEAVY FOIL LETTING ENDS OF FOIL HANG OVER
EDGES OF PAN.  PLACE BRISKET IN PAN.  SPRINKLE THE SUGAR, SOUP MIX,
GARLIC POWDER AND DRIZZLE CATSUP OVER BRISKET.  FOLD ENDS OF FOIL
OVER SEALING SECURELY AND LEAVING AIR SPACE.  BAKE AT 325 FOR 3-31/2
HOURS OR TILL TENDER.  TRANSFER TO PLATTER AND SLICE. SKIM FAT FROM
SAUCE.  TO MAKE AHEAD AND REHEAT:  AFTER COOKING COOL IT AND SLICE.
STORE SAUCE AND BRISKET SEPERATELY.  CHILL UP TO 2 DAYS.  TO SERVE
PUT IN 8X8 PAN POUR SAUCE OVER ALL AND BAKE COVERED AT 325 FOR 25-30
MIN.

SPREAD PIE FILLING ON BOTTOM OF 9X12 DISH.  SPRINKLE CAKE MIX OVER
TOP. POUR MELTED MARGARINE OVER TOP THEN SPRINKLE WITH PECANS.  BAKE
AT 350 FOR 50-60 MIN.

MIX YAMS, BEATEN EGGS, SALT, VANILLA, SUGAR, COCONUT AND EVAPORATED
MILK. BAKE IN 8" SQUARE DISH AT 350 FOR 45 MIN.  TOPPING:  CHOP
CHERRIES IN FOOD PROCESSOR;  MIX WITH PINEAPPLE, CORN STARCH, AND
SUGAR.  STIR WELL AND BRING TO A BOIL OVER LOW HEAT.  BOIL FOR 2 MIN.
POUR OVER YAMS WHEN DONE.

GREASE A 9X12 BAKING DISH WITH BUTTER. ARRANGE APPLE SLICES IN DISH.
SPRINKLE WITH SUGAR AND CINNAMON AND DOT WITH BUTTER.  MIX SUGAR,
FLOUR BAKING POWDER AND STIR IN BEATEN EGG TILL CRUMBLY.  POUR OVER
APPLES AND BAKE AT 350 TILL DONE ABOUT 30-45 MIN.

LINE PIE PLATE WITH PASTRY. ARRANGE APPLE SLICES IN PASTRY-LINED PIE
PLATE. MIX SUGAR AND CINNAMON TOGETHER.  POUR OVER APPLES.  DOT WITH
OLEO. COVER TOP WITH CRUMB TOPPING.  BAKE AT 400 FOR 50-60 MIN.
TOPPING:  1/2 C OLEO, 1/2 C BROWN SUGAR, 1 C FLOUR.  CREAM OLEO AND
BROWN SUGAR TOGETHER.  CUT IN FLOUR.

Mix all dry ingredients.  Blend in remaining ingredients.  Mix
thoroughly.
pour into unbaked pastry lined pie plate.  Bake, paying particular
attention to the baking temperatures and times.  Preheat oven to 450.
Bake at 450 for 10 min. then turn temerature back to 350 and continue
baking for 30 min. more.

COMBINE SOUR CREAM, 2 T. FLOUR, 3/4 C  SUGAR, VANILLA AND EGG. BEAT 5
MIN AT MEDIUM SPEED OR TILL SMOOTH.  FOLD IN BLUEBERRIES.  POUR INTO
PIE SHELL. BAKE AT 400 FOR 25 MIN.  COMBINE REMAINING INGREDIENTS
PLUS A LITTLE SUGAR, STIRRING WELL. SPRINKLE OVER TOP OF PIE.  BAKE
10 MORE MIN.

SOAK PEPPERS IN BOILING WATER FOR 5 MIN.  COMBINE GR. MEAT, 3 t SALT,
BLACK PEPPER, ONION AND RICE.  PACK MEAT MIXTURE INTO EACH PEPPER
HALF. IN DUTCH OVEN  COMBINE TOMATO SOUP, SUGAR, VINEGAR AND
REMAINING SALT. PLACE PEPPERS INTO SOUP BASTING EACH ONE. COVER AND
SIMMER OVER LOW HEAT FOR ABOUT AN HOUR OR TILL DONE.  SERVE OVER
MACARONI.

PREHEAT OVEN TO 350.  COMBINE SUGAR, OIL, EGGS AND VANILLA IN A BOWL
AND MIX WELL.  ADD MIXTURE OF FLOUR, SALT, SODA AND CINNAMON AND MIX
WELL. STIR IN RAISINS, APPLES AND PECANS.  POUR INTO 2 GREASED AND
FLOURED LOAF PANS. BAKE 1 HR & 15 MIN. OR TILL LOAVES TEST DONE.

MIX ALL INGREDIENTS TOGETHER.  YOU MAY NEED TO ADD A LITTLE MORE MILK
IF IT'S TOO THICK.  BAKE IN A GREASED 9X12 DISH AT 350 FOR 30 MIN. OR
TILL DONE.

Preheat oven to 450.  Cut potatoes into large chunks. In large
plastic bag or bowl, add all ingredients.  Close bag and shake, or
toss in bowl, until potatoes are evenly coated.  Empty potatoes into
shallow baking or roasting pan; discard bag.  Bake, stirring
occasionally, 40 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden
brown.  Garnish, if desired, with chopped fresh parsley.

Combine all ingredients; mix lightly and press into an 8X4 inch loaf
pan. Bake 1 hour at 350.  Let stand 5 minutes before slicing. (I top
with ketchup or BBQ sauce before baking.)

Brown and drain hamburger.  Add soup and sauce.  Mix well.  Place a
layer of tortillias in a 13"X9" pan, add a layer of hamburger
mixture, then a layer of grated cheese.  Continue to layer until
hamburger mixture is used.  Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.

Brown onion and hamburger meat.  Pour into dish.  Place slice
potatoes on top of meat.  Mix soup, sour cream, milk, salt and
pepper.  Pour evenly over meat and potatoes.  Sprinkle with cheese.
Cover with foil or lid. Bake at 350 for 1 1/2 hours or until potatoes
are done.

Line pie plate with pastry.  Boil sugar and syrup together for about 2
minutes.  Pour slowly over slightly beaten eggs, oleo that has been
cut up & vanilla, stirring vigorously.  Add nuts. Pour into unbaked
pie shell. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.  Try keeping filling off edge
of pie crust.

Brown ground meat and drain.  Saute vegetables. Mix ground meat,
vegetables, tomatoe products & seasonings. Cook macaroni as directed
and add last.

Lightly spray with Pam 9" X 13" pan.  Arrange each ingrediant side by
side.  Sprinkle fat free italian dressing mix on top to taste.  Cover.
Bake at 425 for 40 to 50 minutes.

Combine cornflakes, sesame seeds, paprika, salt and pepper and set
aside. Pound chicken thin and brush with skim milk, coat with cereal
mixture, and place on nonstick baking pan.  Dot cutlet with 2 tsp
reduced calorie margarine and bake 15 minutes at 400 F or until done.

Spray large skillet with nonstick cooking spray.  Cook chicken and
onion over medium-high heat until chicken is browned, stirring
occasionally. Add vegetables, soup, velveeta, and water; mix well.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until
vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally.  Remove from
heat; stir in sour cream, rotel, and noodles.  Salt and pepper to
taste.

Brown ground meat and onions and drain.  Add spices and stir over low
heat for about 2 minutes.  Add tomato sauce, water, and beans.
Simmer 30 minutes.

Peal and cube potatoes and boil till tender (approximately 10
minutes). Add chopped onion and pickles, mayo, mustard and boiled
eggs to drained potatoes.  Salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste.
Stir in a little paprika and top with paprika for color.

Mix all ingrediants together except bacon.  Can use 1/2 barbeque
sauce and 1/2 ketchup if desired.  Partially cook bacon and place on
top.  Bake at 350 for 1 hour.

Cut meat into smaller chunks, trim off gristle & fat.  Heat 1 Tbsp
oil in pan.  Season meat and brown on both sides.  Brown with small
amount of chopped onions.  Turn down heat and allow to simmer for
about 15 minutes while preparing veggies.  Season to taste.  Cook
meat, carrots, 2/3 cup water, potatoes, celery, tomatoes, onion in
crock pot on low approximately 8 hours.  Add corn & green beans and
cook 1 more hour or until hot.

Cut twinkies in half and line bottom of 9X13 glass pan.  Cover with
Vanilla pudding.  Cover with Strawberries and bananas.  Cover cool
whip, then chopped nuts.

Combine flour, salt, and cream of tartar in a sacuepan.  Mix liquids
and gradually stir them into dry ingredients.  When mixture is
smooth, cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until a ball
forms.  Remove from heat and knead until smooth.  This is a very
pliable and long-lasting play dough.  It has a more elastic
consistency than uncooked play dough. Student teachers voted this
their favorite play dough mixture.

Dry bread slices in oven and blend in blender to make bread crumbs.
Toast almonds for about 5 minutes at 325.  Melt soup, cheese, water,
and juice from can chicken in saucepan.  Blend in chicken and drained
green beans. Grease casserole dish and put in bread crumbs.  Pour
saucepan mixture on top of bread crumbs.  Heat at 350 for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven, put extra shredded cheese and toasted almonds on
top.  Return to to oven to melt cheese.

Cook: Beef & onion in large dutch oven till meat is browned, stirring
until it crumbles, drain & stir in rest of ingredients.  Bring to a
boil, reduce heat & simmer 15 minutes.  Yields 3 1/2 quarts (Note:
May be frozen up to 3 months)

1 cup serving = 20 optional calories, 1 bread, and 1 protein

Cake: Mix all ingredients and pour in pan.  Bake at 350 for 35-40
minutes.
Frost while hot.

Frosting: Beat cream cheese and butter until smooth.  Add vanilla and
powdered sugar.  Add milk a little at a time.  Fold in coconut.
Sprinkle more coconut on top if desired.

Soften cream cheese and add mayo & sugar and blend.  Stir in cranberry
sauce, pineapple, & pecans.  Fold in cool whip.  Pour into 13 X 9
glass pyrex dish.  Freeze.  Remove 20 to 30 minutes before serving.
Cut into squares. Re-freeze what is left over.

Spread peanut butter on Ritz crackers to make a sandwich.  Dip in
melted chocolate.

name: Old Fashioned Glazed Dutch Apple Cake
author: Ossie Ivory

instructions.content:
Combine all ingredients except apples & nuts, blend well.  Fold in
apples and nuts.  For 2 cups of chopped apples use 2 apples peeled -
no core, chopped fine.  Pour in 10 inch tube bunt pan and bake at 350
for XX minutes.  Pour glaze over hot cake. Cool for 2 hours before
serving.

Glaze:
Combine all ingredients and cook for 3 minutes to get hot.
Bake chicken covered for 1 hour at 350.  Uncover for 1/2 hour (baste).

Cut all grapes in the Del Monte Fruit Cocktail in half. Dice the
peaches and pears. Cut the maraschino cherries in half.  Peal skin
off apples & finely slice the apples like shoestrings. Squeeze the
oranges like grapefruit.  Mix together all ingredients including the
syrups.  Add diced banana last.  Acid from the oranges helps them
from turning brown.

Bring oleo and sugar to a boil and cook for 1 minute.  Add chopped
pecans. Line 2 10 X 15 pans with foil and spray lightly with Pam.
Put 2 sleeves of crackers on cookie sheets.  Spoon mixture over
crackers.  Bake at 350 for 10 minutes.

Chop and store cabbage and green onions overnight.  Saute noodles,
sesame seeds and almonds till brown in margarine.  Drain on paper
towel until cool.  Mix dressing and store in refrigerator.  Put all
together just before serving.

Prepare yellow cake mix as directed.  Bake and cool.  When cool, punch
lots of holes in the cake with a fork.  Dissolve strawberry jello and
stawberry soda.  Heat, but do not boil.  Add frozen strawberries.
Pour slowly over the cake.

Mix milk and vanilla instant pudding mix.  Fold in Cool Whip.  Pour
over the cake.

Cover and place in the refrigerator.

Note:  I add a drop or two of red food coloring to the topping.

Brown hamburger and drain.  Saute with onions and add enchilada sauce
and beans and simmer.  Mix soups with water and green chilies over
low heat. In a 9 X 13 greased baking dish layer 6 tortillas, 1/2
meat, 1/2 soup, 1/2 cheese and repeat with tortillas to cheese again.
Crumble Doritoes on top.  Bake at 350 for 40-60 minutes.  Set for 10
minutes.

Put cereal in bowl & set aside.  Microwave chocolate chips, peanut
butter, and butter in 1 quart microwavable bowl for 1 minute
uncovered.  Stir & put back in microwave for 30 seconds.  Stir in
vanilla.  Pour mixture over cereal until covered and stir.  Pour into
big plastic bag and put powdered sugar in it.  Then shake until well
covered.  Spread out on wax paper to cool.

In a small saucepan, melt 1/2 of the butter over low heat.  With a
spoon, skim off white froth that forms on top of butter and discard.
Pour melted butter into a large bowl, leaving behind any sediment
that has formed in the bottom of the pan.  Add remaining butter and
sugar to melted butter and beat until fluffy.  Add eggs and vanilla
and beat well.  Add flour, little by little, stirring well after each
addition until all flour has been added and dough is smooth.  Set
dough aside for at least one hour. Preheat oven to 400.  Place dough
on a clean flat surface that has been dusted with flour.  Dust a
rolling pin with flour and roll out dough to 1/8 inch thickness.  Cut
dough into a variety of shapes with cookie cutters that have been
dipped in flour.  Carefully place cut-out dough onto ungreased cookie
sheets.  Bake 8 to 10 minutes, until edges of cookies just begin to
turn brown.  While one pan of cookies is baking, gather up leftover
scraps of dough and roll into a ball.  If necessary, dust rolling
surface and rolling pin with flour again.  Don't use too much flour,
or cookies will be tough.  Roll out dough and cut into shapes to be
baked.  Repeat until the dough is used up.  Recipe from book Cooking
the German Way by Helga Parnell, 1988 Lerner Publications

Boil macaroni according to directions on package.  Dice the mexican
velveeta cheese and combine with ingredients in a bowl.  Mix with
cooked macaroni and cover with a little milk.  Grate cheddar cheese
on top. Cover with foil and bake 25 minutes at 350.

Brown meat with mushrooms, bell pepper, and half the onion and
seasonings (salt/pepper/garlic).  Place croissants flat side by side
in casserole dish or pizza pan and bake until done.  Top baked
croissants with meat mixture and serve as sliced pizza.  Toppings are
added as desired.

Brown ground meat and mushrooms together.  While cooking meat, mix
remaining ingredients except biscuits together, then add to meat when
done.  Place in casserole dish and cover with biscuits.  Bake 20
minutes at 350 (until biscuits are done).  Can use a can of cream of
broccoli soup in place of one of the cans of cream of mushroom soup.

name: Parmesan Chicken Skillet with Angel Hair
author: Terri Findley

instructions.content:
Cut chicken into thin strips.  Toss chicken with Italian seasoning.
Saute chicken with butter in large skillet on high heat for 5 minutes
or until no longer pink inside.  Add 1 1/4 cup water, milk & peas
(drained) and bring to a boil.  Stir in pasta, special seasonings &
tomato.  Reduce heat to medium. Gently boil uncovered 4 to 5 minutes
or until pasta is tender. Let stand 3 minutes.

Mix all ingredients except cheese, chicken, & tortillas.  Grease 9 X
13 pan.  Layer with tortillas, 1/2 chicken, then 1/2 mixture, then 1/2
cheese.  Repeat layers. Cook at 350 for 30 minutes.

Crust:
Spread crescent rolls in 11X17 jelly roll pan that has been sprayed
with Pam.  Bake 15 minutes at 350.  Let cool.

Filling:
Beat cream cheese, miracle whip & ranch dressing mix until fluffy.
Spread on cooled crust.

Chopped Ingredients:
Finley chop any of the vegetables.  Press these into the filling.  Put
shredded cheese on top.  Put saran on top & press down so veggies
don't fall off crust.

Mix cream cheese and dressing mix.  Spread thinly over piece of bread.
Slice cucumbers thin, put one slice on top of each piece of bread.
Sprinkle dill weed on top.

Boil 4 cups of water, add sugar, steep teabag for 30 minutes.  After
steeping add almond extract, lemon juice, ginger ale, and remainder of
water.  Float fresh fruit in punch bowl.

Mix peanut oil, Worchestershire powder, and salt and coat inside of a
brown paper bag.  Put turkey inside bag and shake around.  Bake the
turkey inside the bag 20 minutes per pound.

Melt butter and combine all ingredients in large bowl, mix in the
hashbrowns last. Bake in 13 X 9 pan for 1 hour at 350.  Top with
additional cheese if desired.

Brown ground meat and drain fat off.  Combine tomato sauce, enchilada
sauce mix and water in a sauce pan.  Bring to a boil then simmer 5
minutes. Stir 1/2 cup of sauce into meat.  Dip each tortilla into
sauce.  Put 3 tablespoons meat filling on each.  Roll tortillas
around filling and place, seam sides down, in 13 X 9 baking dish.
Spread remaining sauce evenly over enchiladas and top with grated
cheese.  Bake for 15 minutes at 350.

Cracker Mixture: Use a zip lock plastic bag to crush Ritz crackers
and mix with chopped pecans and sugar.

Meringue: Beat egg whites with wire whisk.  Add salt and 1 tablespoon
of sugar and beat in.  Continue to beat in rest of sugar 1 tablespoon
at a time. Beat in vanilla.

Mix cracker mixture and meringue together and pour into 9" pie plate
greased with butter.  Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.  Cool.  Top with
Cool Whip and sprinkle with chopped pecans.

Drain juice from stawberries if frozen.  Mix lemon juice into Eagle
Brand milk.  Fold in strawberries and cool whip.  Put into pie shells
and chill.

Heat oven to 350. Brown meat with garlic and drain.  Stir in spaghetti
sauce and seasonings and simmer for 10 minutes. Cook pasta according
to package directions for 8 minutes and drain. Toss hot pasta with
meat sauce.  In a 9 X 12 dish spoon half the pasta mixture, spread
rocotta cheese and half of the mozarella cheese (1 cup) on top.
Layer with remaining pasta, sprinkle with rest of mozarella (1 cup)
and parmesan cheese. Cover loosely with foil.  Bake 25 minutes at
350. Remove foil. Bake 5 minutes or till hot & bubbly.

Drain the mushroom stems/pieces & the sliced water chestnuts.
Combine all ingredients except margarine in 1 1/2 quart casserole.
Top with pats of margarine.  Bake covered at 350 45 to 60 minutes or
until rice is tender.

Brown ground meat and drain.  Add remaining ingredients and simmer
over medium until thoroughly heated.

Brown sausage & hamburger meat & drain.  Add onions & celery &
continue cooking.  Cook rice in chicken broth with salt.  Add to meat
mixture.  Add more broth if too dry.

Boil eggs, peal, and cut in half long ways.  Remove yolks and mash
with fork. Add all ingredients except red pepper and mix well. Stuff
the egg whites. Sprinkle with red pepper.

Cook pasta according to package directions (slightly undercook) and
drain. Brown chicken, bacon, and onion with olive oil & garlic. Spray
non-stick in large casserole dish and combine all ingredients and top
with parmesian cheese.  Bake covered at 350 for 1 hour.

Add lemon juice to milk to make sour and dissolve the baking soda in
the milk. Mix all ingredients in bowl.  Grease & flour pans (2 loaf
or 1 tube).  Fill pans only a little more than half way.  Cook @ 375
for 50-55 minutes.

Combine batter ingredients and dredge fish in corn meal mixture.  Fry
in hot oil about 5 to 6 minutes.

Can keep fish cold with ice cubes in bowl with fish.  Use peanut oil
to fry the fish since it cooks at a higher temperature.  Cook fish at
500F. If you don't have a thermometer you can use a white tip (not
safety) kitchen match to test when the oil is ready.  The match will
light when the tip is touched to the hot oil.  Can also test with a
french fry. French fries and fish when first dropped in the oil will
sink but then later start to float indicating they are done, but
leave in longer for desired crispness.  Use plastic bags to coat the
fish with the batter. Drain oil from fish with a colander before
placing on paper towel covered plate.

In a large mixing bowl beat eggs until foamy.  Gradually add sugar;
beat until thickened.  Add remaining ingredients except milk and mix
thoroughly.  Pour into can.  Add milk to fill line and stir well.
Freeze as directed.

For pumpkin ice cream: Add 2 tsp cinammon, 1 tsp nutmeg, 1 can
unsweetned pumpkin, 2 cans of eagle brand instead of 1 1/2 cans

For peppermint ice cream: Add 2 tsp of creme de menthe and 1 cup of
crushed peppermint sticks.

For chocolate ice cream: Add 1 small box of chocolate instant pudding
& 1 can Hershey's chocolate syrup.  Mix the pudding with a little
milk first.

Pour 1 cup of water into a large bowl.  Add food coloring and swirl.
Pour in cornstarch.  Add 2/3 cup of water and swirl but do not stir.
Wait 15 minutes, then begin lifting Oobleck from the bottom of the
bowl with your hand.

Season flounder with salt, pepper, red pepper, and garlic powder and a
little lemon juice.  Dot with butter.  Wrap in foil and bake for 40
minutes at 350.

Saute mushrooms in a sauce pan in butter with green onion for 15
minutes at low heat.  Add red wine, salt & pepper to taste.

Preheat oven to 350.  Unroll the crescent roll dough without
separating the triangles.  Separate the dough into 2 squares along
the center cut line.  Place 1 square of dough into an 8 inch square
baking dish; using your fingertips, press dough to fit the bottom of
the dish.  Layer with half of each of the turkey, ham, salami, swiss
cheese, and roasted peppers.  Pour half of the beaten eggs over the
peppers and repeat with the remaining meat, cheese, and peppers.
Place the remaining square of dough over the peppers.  Pour the
remaining beaten eggs over the dough and cover lightly with foil.
Bake for 20 minutes, remove foil, and bake for an additional 20 to 22
minutes, or until golden and heated through.  Let cool for 15 to 20
minutes, then cut and serve.

Preheat oven to 350.  Place the flour in a shallow dish; Rinse the
pork chops and leave damp. Coat the pork chops completely in the
flour.  Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  Brown the
pork chops in batches for 5 to 6 minutes per side.  Meanwhile,
combine the remaining ingredients in a 9" X 13" baking dish; mix
well.  Place the browned pork chops over the rice mixture.  Cover the
casserole dish with aluminum foil and bake for 1 hour, or until no
pink remains in the pork.

Prepare and bake any flavor cake mix as directed.  Put cake in
container and poke holes or tear apart. (If you want to slice like a
cake just poke holes.)  Mix 2 packages of jello but take out 1/3 cup
and set aside before adding cold water.  Pour jello on cake and into
holes.  Chill.

Topping: Mix until creamy 1/3 cup of warm jello and the cream cheese.
Prepare 2 packages of instant pudding using only 3 cups of milk
intead of 4.  Mix jello/cream cheese mixture into the pudding.  Add 2
cups of Cool Whip.  Add fruit such as mandarin oranges.  Beat with
mixer until fruit is blended into pudding.  Top cake and refrigerate.
Best if removed from refrigerator an hour or so before serving.

Boil coffee, water, & sugar.  Chill.  Mix together ice cream and milk.
Add to cofee mixture.  Mix well.

Combine cheeses.  Sprinkle half of cheese in an ungreased 13X9 pan.
Saute' mushrooms, green onions, and pepper in margarine/butter until
tender. Arrange vegetables over cheeses.  Arrange meat over
vegetables.  Sprinkle cheese over meat.  When ready to bake, blend
flour, milk, parsley, and eggs. Pour over layers.  Bake in preheated
350 degrees over 35-40 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes before
cutting/serving.

This recipe is quite forgiving.  I often use green, red or yellow bell
peppers interchangeable (@ Christmas), fresh mushrooms instead of
canned, fresh or dried parsley and either cooked bacon, sausage or
ham as the mood and my refrigerator yield.  I have also served it
with a salsa topping or soy sauce or fresh tomatoes depending on the
guests.  Especially pretty served on lettuce leaves with a sliced
tomato atop.  Recipe says serves 8 but I find it yields more.

Brown ground meat, pepper and onion together with salt, pepper, and
garlic powder then drain.  Add other ingredients and cook till heated
through.
Mix ingredients together.  Bake at 375 for about 10 minutes.

Heat oven to 400.  Grease pie plate 10 X 1 1/2 inches.  Brown beef and
onion; drain.  Stir in salt & pepper.  Spread in plate.  Beat milk,
baking mix and eggs until smooth - 1 minute with hand beater.  Pour
into plate. Bake 20 minutes.  Top with tomatoes; sprinkle with
cheese.  Bake until knife inserted in center comes out clean, 5 to 8
minutes.  Cool 5 minutes.

Mix all together and put in an unbaked pie shell.  Bake at 375 for 45
minutes or till done.

Mix all ingredients together and bake in an unbaked pie shell about 1
hour at 350 or until done.

Beat cream cheese and peanut butter in large bowl until smooth.  Beat
in powdered sugar.  Stir in chopped butterfinger.  Fold in cool whip.
